title: Peppers Stylish Melbourne City Apartments with Gourmet Dining & Valet Parking
description:
Immerse yourself in the buzzing energy of Melbourne with a luxury stay at Shadow Play by Peppers. This avant-garde accommodation offers chic apartment living in the heart of the city's vibrant Southbank entertainment precinct, within easy reach of top attractions and hidden delights including Crown Casino and the popular South Melbourne Markets.

More than just a hotel, this inner-city abode's unique interior design and cosmopolitan ambience echoes throughout the architecture, from the ultra-luxe apartments for up to four guests to the sophisticated wine bar and cellar showcasing exquisite Victorian produce.

After days exploring, enjoy a dip in the heated pool, blow off steam in the sauna or unwind in front of the fireplace in the enclosed winter garden on the top floor. Whether you’re planning a romantic escape for you and your better half, a fun-filled family holiday or you want to explore a new city with a group of friends, you’ll feel right at home in the stylish surrounds of Shadow Play by Peppers.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Wake up with daily delicious à la carte breakfast
- Celebrate on arrival with your choice of cocktail by Cloakroom at Edwin Wine Bar & Cellar
- Feel like a VIP with daily valet parking for one vehicle per stay
- Treat yourself with a one-time dessert per person from the sweet menu at Edwin Wine Bar & Cellar
- Indulge with a glass of Victorian wine and a meat and cheese plate at Edwin Wine Bar & Cellar
- Relax after a day of adventures with in-house movies and popcorn
- Stay connected with complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi
- Explore until the very last moment with guaranteed late 12pm checkout

**Travelling as a group?** Upgrade to a Two-Bedroom, Two-Bathroom Apartment with inclusions for up to four guests.

title: Legendary Stay at The Hotel Windsor
description: Have an A-List city stay with two nights in Melbourne's most iconic hotel, The Hotel Windsor, located just a stroll away from the beating heart of the CBD. Immerse yourself in the history of the most famous Grand Heritage Hotel in Australia, and stay in the same suites as rock stars and royalty. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a complimentary bottle of wine, a tin of the hotel's exclusive Windsor Morning Tea, a drink each at the hotel's Cricketers Bar, delicious chocolates and a leisurely late check out.

title: Melbourne Award-Winning Luxury on the Yarra River with Daily Breakfast & A$50 Dining Credit + Club Upgrades Available
description:
Cobblestone laneways, hidden coffee shops and some of Australia’s finest dining: nowhere is better placed to introduce you to Melbourne’s extraordinary spirit than at this iconic five-star hotel, effortlessly blending timeless luxury on the southern banks of the mighty Yarra River.

Step into The Langham Melbourne’s grand lobby and enter a world of crystal, marble and hand-carved mahogany, where afternoon tea is high art, hospitality is sacred and signature notes of ginger flower and jasmine hang gently in the air.

After days spent exploring Melbourne’s best, return to the opera-inspired Aria Bar & Lounge for classic cocktails mixed to perfection, or upgrade your stay to enjoy access to the magnificent The Langham Club, newly refurbished and boasting unbeatable views over Flinders Street Station and Southbank.

Luxury this good demands a day spa to match: Chuan Spa offers one of the city’s most beloved oases of calm, with treatments informed by a thousand years of Chinese wellness traditions. Alternatively, head to the hotel’s rooftop for laidback drinks and a lazy dip in the hotel’s swimming pool.

title: Top-Rated Melbourne Ovolo Laneways Escape with Daily Breakfast & Complimentary Minibar
description:
Immerse yourself in Melbourne’s colourful and creative culture during an escape at the top-rated Ovolo Laneways - a designer wonderland inspired by the bustling laneways and towering skyscrapers of the CBD's iconic canvas. Nestled amid popular brunch spots, stylish bars, live music venues, theatres and fashionable boutiques, this eclectic hotel puts you within walking distance of the area’s hottest spots. Easy access to nearby attractions is guaranteed thanks to Melbourne's extensive network of trams and trains.

Fully embracing Melbourne’s love of street art, Ovolo Laneways delights with original artworks and splashes of bright colour in the lobby and rooms. Friendly staff embody the city’s easy-going spirit and can help with anything from extra towels to insider tips on the best bars. Beloved for its effortless high-tech touches, personal service and artsy interiors, it's not hard to see why Ovolo Laneways is currently rated among the top 10% of hotels worldwide on Tripadvisor.

**Your** **handpicked inclusions:**

- Refuel with daily continental 'grab and go' breakfast before hitting the streets of Melbourne
- Your complimentary minibar is replenished daily with wine, beer and soft drinks
- Join the nightly social hour for one house drink each and bar nibbles to share
- Help yourself to goodies from the complimentary Candy Bar in the lobby
- Feel like a VIP with a welcome loot bag full of delicious treats
- Relax until the very last moment with a leisurely 12pm late checkout

**Travelling with friends or family?** Upgrade to the Two-Bedroom Suite for up to four guests.

**Dining Experience Upgrade:** Upgrade your stay to include a six-course dining experience of modern Australian cuisine with a distinct Asian influence at Melbourne's iconic Taxi Kitchen restaurant (select days).
offer_address: 19 Little Bourke Street, Melbourne 3000, Victoria, Australia

vendor_name: Hotel Chadstone Melbourne MGallery by Sofitel
title: Five-Star Melbourne Glamour within Australia's Fashion Capital with Daily Breakfast and $100 Luxury Escapes Credit
description:
Setting a new benchmark in luxury, Hotel Chadstone Melbourne MGallery promises to deliver you into glamour with a stay within Australia's Fashion Capital. Inspired by the creative journey of fashion, the five-star hotel offers a voyage of seamless discoveries, exceptional service, peerless guest experiences and stunning views of the Melbourne skyline, Port Phillip Bay and the Dandenong Ranges. Discover a myriad of boutiques, entertainment and dining options at Chadstone - The Fashion Capital including the Luxury Escapes Chadstone Retail Experience.

During your stay at Hotel Chadstone Melbourne MGallery invigorate your mind and body at the multi-purpose fitness centre or the heated indoor curved rooftop pool located on level 12. Indulge in soothing treatments at Holism Retreat Melbourne Day Spa and savour culinary delights at Pastore restaurant before sipping cool cocktails at Altus Rooftop & Bar.

title: Elegant Apartments in the Heart of Southbank with Rooftop Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the essence of Melbourne at this inner-city haven, where lattes, laneways and the city's signature trams set the scene. Its distinctive interior design, cosmopolitan atmosphere and avant-garde touches create a stylish retreat, ideal for exploring romantic rooftop bars, art-filled laneways and upscale boutiques.

Return to light-filled, self-contained apartments - each featuring fully equipped kitchens, spacious living areas and laundries - and sample Victorian-focused wines, hand-selected by world-renowned sommeliers, at Edwin Wine Bar and Cellar.

Laze by the hotel’s shimmering heated pool, spend cooler evenings by the fireplace in the hotel’s sleek rooftop garden space or savour masterful cocktails. A sauna and steam room are also on offer, perfect for unwinding after a busy day exploring Melbourne’s best attractions such as the Royal Botanic Gardens or Arts Centre Melbourne.

title: Stylish North Melbourne Stay with Room Upgrade & Daily À La Carte Breakfast
description:
Enjoy a stylish city break, just a 15-minute tram ride from Melbourne's CBD, at Mercure North Melbourne. This contemporary hotel offers spacious, light-filled rooms, beautifully renovated and brimming with thoughtful amenities. Sweat it out at the nearby fully equipped gym, treat yourself to delectable dining at Polo Café or lounge by the swimming pool when the sun is shining.

The tram stop just outside makes it easy to head into the CBD, where you'll find the National Gallery of Victoria, Eureka Skydeck, lively bars and iconic Melbourne restaurants such as Chin Chin and MoVida. The hotel's North Melbourne location also makes it convenient to discover Melbourne Zoo (10 minutes by tram or five minutes by car) and the quirky nearby suburbs of Fitzroy, Brunswick and Abbotsford.
offer_address: Cnr Flemington Road &, Harker St, North Melbourne VIC 3051

title: Pullman Melbourne Luxury Stay in the Heart of Albert Park with Daily Breakfast
description:
If you’re looking for a sophisticated yet tranquil Melbourne city stay, look no further than the award-winning Pullman Melbourne Albert Park. Perfectly poised on the famed Albert Park Lake, and within walking distance of picturesque Fawkner Park, this stylish hotel sits moments from the buzz of the CBD, St Kilda's iconic beaches, and the bars and boutiques of South Yarra’s eclectic Chapel Street.

There’s plenty to discover beyond the hotel, but this luxury oasis is sure to entice you to stay and enjoy. Part of the acclaimed Pullman Hotels and Resorts brand, Pullman Melbourne Albert Park offers guests a first-class experience through its state-of-the-art amenities and outstanding service. Treat yourself to a global dining affair at Windows Restaurant or opt for something more relaxed with a drink at the Atrium Bar & Lounge. Early risers are catered for at the Espresso Café, while fitness fanatics can enjoy the in-house gymnasium and swimming pool, or head out for a picturesque run along the Albert Park Lake loop.
offer_address: 65 Queens Road, Albert Park 3004, Victoria, Australia

title: Brand-New Melbourne Boutique Laneway Luxury with Daily Breakfast
description:
Beaming 29 stories above the bustling heart of Flinders Lane is the brand new Quincy Melbourne, a luxuriously fun abode that brings the zing of Southeast Asia to Melbourne. Making a bold statement on the CBD scene, this eclectic hotel is surrounded by graffitied laneways, high-end restaurants, hole-in-the-wall cafés and more, making it the perfect location to immerse yourself in the city's iconic culture.

A stay at Quincy Melbourne guarantees to awaken your senses: inhale the scent of freshly brewed coffee at onsite café SingSong, admire vibrant hues of pink and blue in the rooms, synonymous with good fortune, run your fingers through textural art installations that adorn the walls and taste the explosive flavours of Southeast Asia at Salted Egg - the hotel's exceptional signature restaurant. Elevate your experience with a Quincy Sling at the Q Club floating 28 stories above Flinders Lane and take in the city views.

title: Melbourne Designer Ovolo Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Step into the designer Ovolo South Yarra and prepare for an extraordinary stay, where raw rockstar energy and retro-inspired pop art meet refined sophistication, right in the beating heart of Melbourne’s coveted cosmopolitan hub. This uber-cool, inner-city retreat has it all: the stylish interiors are reminiscent of former nightclub Studio 54, and each striking room pays homage to the golden days of pop, rock and disco legends. Discover vintage album covers and suites named after music's most iconic pairings - Sonny and Cher and John and Yoko.

Located near the corner of Toorak Road and Chapel Street, this designer escape is ideally located in the thick of the action, where chef-hatted restaurants, caffeine-fuelled cafés, and designer boutiques rub shoulders with the city’s must-see attractions - NGV Melbourne and St Kilda's Luna Park are a short tram or train ride away. When you've had your fill of stencil-stained laneways, head down to Lona Misa restaurant, helmed by renowned Melbourne chefs Shannon Martinez and Ian Curley. Here, tuck into delicious vegan and vegetarian food that is loud and unapologetic, or let the bar sate your thirst with expertly crafted cocktails.
offer_address: 234 Toorak Road, South Yarra, Victoria 3141, Australia

title: BEST OF 2019: Luxurious Five-Star Langham Stay at Australia's #1 Hotel
description: Discover cobblestone laneways, world-famous coffee and vibrant street art with a glamorous stay at The Langham Melbourne - commanding the waterfront of the Yarra River and recently voted the #1 hotel in Australia and New Zealand at Condé Nast Traveler Readers’ Choice Awards. Explore the magic of Melbourne staying in style with a lavish daily buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner credits for the award-winning Melba Restaurant, 20% off at the blissful Chuan Spa and complimentary valet parking.

title: Comfortable Outer Melbourne Stay near Dandenong Ranges with Restaurant & Bar
description: Convenience is key with a comfortable stay at the welcoming ibis Melbourne Glen Waverley. Just 30 minutes from Melbourne’s city centre, this ideal location offers a quiet and restful stay away from the thriving CBD. The hotel also provides direct access to some of the region’s most magnificent natural attractions, from the Dandenong Ranges to the Yarra Valley and the Mornington Peninsula. While there are an array of cafes, restaurants and entertainment hubs on the hotel’s doorstep, including The Glen Shopping Centre, guests also have the option of keeping things simple with a hearty buffet breakfast, dinner or drinks at the relaxed ibis Kitchen Restaurant & Bar.
offer_address: 297 Springvale Road, Glen Waverley 3150, Victoria, Australia

title: Contemporary Mercure Melbourne Escape near Emporium with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Wine
description: Tucked between iconic Bourke Street - home to the eponymous mall - and immediately next door to Emporium, Mercure Welcome Melbourne's location on Little Bourke is second to none. Moments from Melbourne's free tram network and Melbourne Central's collection of shops and restaurants, this contemporary hotel boasts easy access to Chinatown, Queen Victoria Market, Degraves Street, Southbank - offering next-level dining along the Yarra River - and local cultural attractions such as the historic Shrine of Remembrance. Savour a Melbourne-strength coffee at The Louden Kitchen & Grill before a day of exploration, then return to relax in your contemporary room.
offer_address: 265 Little Bourke St, Melbourne VIC 3000, Australia

vendor_name: Best Western Queen Victoria Market Hotel
title: Brand-New Melbourne City Break near Queen Victoria Market
description: Visit marvellous Melbourne with endless cheap eats, unique shopping, and laneways to explore with a stay in Melbourne’s Best Western Queen Victoria Market Hotel. As the name implies, you will be mere minutes from one of the city’s largest and most well-known markets, while known for fresh produce, the market has many stalls offering handmade, second hand and international fashion, accessories, souvenirs and much more. From the historic terrace houses that line the bustling city streets to the crowds of people flocking to the bars and restaurants dotted along the banks of the Yarra River on a sunny day, there truly is something magical about this city. Treat yourself to a city break and explore the art, fashion and history that make Melbourne a memorable escape, then retreat to the rooms of the new Best Western to relax and unwind in comfort.
location_description: Best Western Queen Victoria Market Hotel
offer_address: 77-79 Capel Street, West Melbourne 3003, Victoria, Australia

title: Award-Winning Melbourne Radisson Escape with Daily Breakfast & Park-View Room Upgrade
description:
If you’re looking for a sophisticated city stay in the heart of Melbourne, the award-winning Radisson on Flagstaff Gardens Melbourne is the answer. Perfectly poised on the doorstep of the city's oldest market, the famed Queen Victoria Market, and directly opposite the leafy Flagstaff Gardens, this stylish hotel ideally sits in the Free Tram Zone, within walking distance of Flagstaff station. Awarded GreenLeaders Gold level status (marking it out for next-level eco-friendly practices), and nominated as Australia's Leading Business Hotel four years running at the World Travel Awards, this central sanctuary offers world-renowned Radisson service and allows you to discover Melbourne’s world-class shopping, coffee and gastronomy with ease.

Stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2021 award, Radisson on Flagstaff Gardens Melbourne offers guests a first-class experience through its state-of-the-art amenities and outstanding service. From the rooftop gym, offering breathtaking views of the Melbourne skyline, to expertly prepared dishes from a seasonally rotating menu at the lavish onsite restaurant and bar, HQ’s on William, Radisson on Flagstaff Gardens Melbourne will enchant you from the moment you arrive.

title: Grand Opening: Adina Pentridge Heritage-Listed Luxury with Guaranteed Room Upgrade, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Set within the bluestone walls of what was once Her Majesty's Prison Pentridge, Adina Apartment Hotel Pentridge is rich with history, heritage and undeniable style. This historic site boasts ultra-modern facilities, including the newly opened North&COMMON, an elevated brasserie championing fresh seasonal ingredients, and the intimate, velvet-draped Olivine Wine Bar.

The hotel sits in the centre of the city's vibrant arts community in North Melbourne. With public transport on your doorstep, venture out to Northcote, Brunswick or Fitzroy - named the Coolest Neighborhood in Australia and #27 in the world last year. Discover the bars, restaurants, galleries, studios, breweries, distilleries and urban wineries that grace the area or, uncover the prison's sombre heritage on an educational tour, experiencing a century of inmate history.

title: Top-Rated Langham Melbourne Five-Star Luxury with Daily Breakfast
description: Discover cobblestone laneways, world-famous coffee and vibrant street art with a glamorous stay at The Langham Melbourne - winner in the Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Awards 2020. A Melbourne icon renowned for its stunning architecture and grand lobby, The Langham graces the city's Southbank with easy access to high-end bars and world-class dining.

title: Modern Melbourne CBD Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Complimentary Valet Parking
description:
Indulge in modern elegance at one of the city's most sought-after addresses with a stay-cay at this recent addition to Melbourne's upscale hotel offerings. Realise the cosmopolitan appeal of this stylish retreat and take advantage of its enviable location, just a tram ride away from the world-famous dining of Flinders Lane, bustling al fresco eateries of Hardware Lane, vibrant salesmanship of the Queen Victoria Market and the retail mecca of Bourke Street Mall.

After a day spent exploring the city, relax with an evening drink at the hotel's luxurious Jin Bar, named after the Mandarin word for gold. Refuel each morning with buffet breakfast, inclusive of eggs made to order, in the light-dappled interiors of Port Bistro. When total relaxation is in order, ascend to the hotel's dedicated wellness spaces including an indoor heated pool, jacuzzi, sauna and steam room.

Guests of the Executive King room can also enjoy exclusive access to Dorsett Melbourne's sophisticated Club Lounge, where alfresco dining, complimentary nibbles and wine and beer between 5pm and 6.30pm, and a welcoming atmosphere awaits.
offer_address: 615 Little Lonsdale Street, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia

title: Elegant Melbourne CBD Stay with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktail & Valet Parking
description: Embrace a cultured lifestyle in the vibrant, eclectic city of Melbourne with a stay at the sophisticated Melbourne Marriott Hotel. Boasting modern features and an unbeatable location in the East End, there truly is no better metropolitan retreat. Embark on a day of art and history with a trip to the nearby National Gallery of Victoria and Melbourne Museum. Start each morning with a hearty breakfast - from eggs benedict to a classic English-style spread, The Essence restaurant has something for everyone.
offer_address: Corner Exhibition & Lonsdale St, Melbourne VIC 3000, Australia

vendor_name: Next Hotel Melbourne, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Award-Winning Melbourne Manhattan-Inspired CBD Stay with Daily A$75 Dining Credit
description:
Step into a world of bespoke sophistication at this cosmopolitan sanctuary that crowns Melbourne's glamorous 80 Collins retail and dining precinct. Consistently ranked as one of the best stays in the city, this haven in the sky redefines the hotel experience.

This landmark precinct in the CBD's prestigious 'Paris End' claims prime real estate among renowned retailers, high-end boutiques, first-class eateries and industry influencers. Throughout the space, you can find thought-provoking pieces by internationally acclaimed Melbourne artists and boutique elements from its heritage past.

The heart and soul of this hotel can be found in its super-sleek dining venues: La Madonna Restaurant & Bar, where the menu perfectly encapsulates the very best of local produce through provocative dishes, and The Barrel Room, where guests can enjoy house-distilled, barrel-aged spirits. With daily A$75 dining and drinks credit to use at La Madonna Restaurant & Bar, your stay here promises pure indulgence.
location_description: Next Hotel Melbourne, Curio Collection by Hilton
offer_address: 103 Little Collins Street, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia

title: Melbourne Marriott Five-Star Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Welcome Sparkling & Valet Parking
description:
Allow yourself to be swept away by the undeniable charm and magic of Victoria’s capital with an elegant stay at the five-star Melbourne Marriott Hotel, perfectly placed for inner-city adventures.

Locals will proudly attest that Melbourne rewards those who look beneath the surface - and the hotel’s CBD location on the corner of Exhibition and Lonsdale Street makes it easy to immerse yourself in the endless experiences hidden within. Whether it's the opening of an award-winning show in the nearby Theatre District just moments from your doorstep, a big-name sporting event at the MCG, discovering a new rooftop bar or the unveiling of the latest exhibition at the NGV, there is no shortage of ways to fill your days with endless adventures perfect for couples or families alike.

When you need a moment of reprieve, the property’s stunning facilities, including an indoor pool and pet-friendly amenities, and stylish rooms await. Expect gleaming marble bathrooms, an exceptionally comfortable bed to give you the rest you deserve, classic furnishings matched with modern accents, plus commanding city views in selected rooms. As for culinary delights, the hotel’s signature restaurant, The Essence, captures the best of modern Australian cuisine, while Elements Lounge and Bar has long established itself as one of the best cocktail bars in the city.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Delicious daily à la carte breakfast The Essence restaurant to fuel you for a day of sightseeing
- Nightly valet parking for one vehicle throughout your stay so you can explore with ease
- Toast your stay with a glass of sparkling per adult on arrival
- Celebrate your stay with a welcome bottle of Redbank Emily Brut Cuvee NV King Valley in your room
- Guaranteed late checkout 1pm to make the most of your final day

**Travelling with family?** Enjoy more room to move when you upgrade to the Family Suite, featuring two bedrooms and two bathrooms plus sweeping city views for up to four guests of any age.

**Executive Lounge Upgrade:** Elevate your stay to the next level in the Executive-Level Queen Room, where you'll enjoy access to the Executive Lounge with non-alcoholic drinks throughout the day and canapés with selected alcoholic drinks (house wine, beer and soft drink) every evening between 5.30-7.30pm.

**Eureka Skydeck Upgrade:** Add this sky-high Eureka Skydeck Upgrade to your Deluxe City View or Executive-Level Queen Room to admire the city from 300 metres above sea level. Gaze across the iconic MCG and Rod Laver Arena, Port Phillip Bay and beyond to the Dandenong Ranges during this 90-minute experience, where you'll also be treated to one cocktail per adult, 'The Edge' experience and a souvenir photograph.
offer_address: Corner Exhibition & Lonsdale St, Melbourne VIC 3000, Australia

title: Melbourne Heritage Glamour in Rialto Precinct with Daily Breakfast & Club Lounge Upgrades Available
description:
Stay in heritage luxury at this five-star Melbourne icon, located inside the Rialto precinct where the 1890s neo-Gothic façade, glass-topped atrium and ornate windows will transport you to the refined elegance of yesteryear. InterContinental Melbourne The Rialto is a masterclass in heritage distinction and five-star sophistication; from the bluestone laneways beneath your feet to the soaring glass atrium above, this historic landmark blends the city’s gold rush grandeur with the refined comforts of modern-day indulgence.

Beyond the lobby, the best of Melbourne awaits. Perfectly positioned on prestigious Collins Street, the hotel places you at the heart of the city’s most stylish thoroughfare. Hop aboard the City Circle tram and pass landmarks like Parliament House and Federation Square, or wander down to graffiti-covered Hosier Lane for a hit of street art and expertly brewed coffee.

When it’s time to unwind, make your way to Bluestone Lounge Bar for a signature cocktail beneath the soaring atrium. Dine in style at Alluvial, where European-inspired dishes are served in elegant surrounds, or pull up a chair at Ronnie’s for rustic Italian fare and a curated wine list. For an elevated stay, upgrade to enjoy access to the Club InterContinental Lounge, where daily refreshments, evening drinks and canapes with skyline views await. 

Wellness is taken seriously here, with a tranquil escape waiting at Botanica Wellness Spa. Soothe tired muscles in the rooftop jacuzzi or sauna, swim a few laps in the enclosed pool, or simply retreat to your luxuriously appointed room.

title: Boutique Art Series Stay with Daily Breakfast
description: Discover artistic luxury at its finest at the eclectic, five-star boutique hotel, The Blackman by Art Series. One of the top-ranked hotels in Melbourne, this stylish inner-city property sits in a prime location just a stone’s throw from the CBD and features the whimsical work of renowned Australian artist Charles Blackman. Ideal for a stylish city break, enjoy daily breakfast at the hotel's highly-rated French restaurant, a welcome bottle of wine, daily self-parking and a late midday checkout.

title: Novotel Escape in the Heart of Melbourne’s Fashion District with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Nestled between the prestigious thoroughfare of Bourke Street Mall and Collins Street’s sophisticated retail precinct, you will find the Novotel Melbourne on Collins. This well-appointed hotel is the key to discovering the bustling streets and iconic laneways that make up the cosmopolitan city of Melbourne. Located directly above the upscale boutiques of St. Collins Lane, you'll be perfectly placed for a romantic escape or a decadent staycation. From fabulous art galleries and historic museums to hatted restaurants and pumping sports stadiums, there's always something to explore, with Rod Laver Area, the Sidney Myer Music Bowl and the National Gallery of Victoria all within walking distance.

With the Novotel Melbourne on Collins as your central city retreat, you'll enjoy a hearty buffet breakfast each morning at the Lane Restaurant, showcasing the vibrant food culture of Melbourne with perfectly cooked eggs, the freshest fruits and delightful yoghurt muesli pots - all while overlooking tree-lined Collins Street vistas. Enjoy an extra taste of luxury by dipping into the soothing heated swimming pool and spa, or indulge in a nightly evening drink at the Lane Bar - the perfect venue for a quiet night cap or an expertly shaken cocktail before a night out exploring Melbourne's many hidden gems.

title: Five-Star Pullman Retreat in the Heart of Melbourne CBD with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Complimentary Parking
description:
Embrace five-star sophistication in the heart of Melbourne at this swanky Little Bourke Street hotel. Perfectly positioned off one of the city's main thoroughfares, Pullman Melbourne City Centre beckons you through a hidden laneway entrance and into an urban retreat away from the hustle and bustle of the CBD.

Treat yourself to breakfast and great coffee at Eva's Restaurant & Bar, or head to Blossom Rooftop Bar - Melbourne's highest rooftop bar - for laidback cocktails and dazzling views over Melbourne's skyline. The hotel offers a first-class experience with state-of-the-art amenities and outstanding service, and when you're ready to explore, Melbourne’s laneways, lattes and laidback speakeasies await.

Landmarks such as Federation Square, Parliament House and the National Gallery of Victoria are all an easy stroll - or tram ride - away. Venture further to Victoria's best-loved places, including the mighty Dandenong Ranges, the Yarra Valley wine region and the windswept beauty of the Great Ocean Road.
offer_address: 265 Little Bourke Street, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia

title: Iconic Melbourne CBD Heritage Luxury with Daily A La Carte Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Step into timeless charm and immerse yourself in the splendour of this iconic Melbourne hotel, once home to both celebrities and royalty. With a history of hosting distinguished guests, from British and Hollywood royalty to Australian prime ministers, this hotel is a key part of Melbourne’s fabric, encouraging guests to relive the grandeur of a beautifully preserved past through its original Victorian decor and elegant afternoon tea service (the longest running in Australia).

As evening falls, indulge in the tradition of a cocktail at the heritage The Cricketers Bar, or wander on over to Antara for a seasonal menu of small plates and a curated selection of wines.

Perfectly located across from Parliament House, next to the renowned Princess Theatre and at the top of bustling Collins Street, this grand, heritage-listed property offers unparalleled access to Melbourne’s famous laneways, cafes and vibrant street art.

title: French-Inspired Sofitel Luxury in the Heart of Melbourne
description: Experience all that Melbourne has to offer at the stylish Sofitel Melbourne on Collins - the city’s highest hotel with jaw-dropping views - located in the heart of the shopping and dining district. Spend a luxurious weekend in a prime location and enjoy Club Sofitel access with exclusive benefits, AU$50 credit to use at the hotel's No35 restaurant, daily breakfast, nightly pre-dinner drinks and canapés, valet parking and a leisurely 2pm check out.
location_description: Sofitel Melbourne on Collins - DO NOT USE

title: Melbourne Boutique Luxury in Former Rolls Royce Showroom with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & A$50 Dining Credit
description:
Prepare to be captivated by the timeless allure that awaits you along Melbourne's renowned St Kilda Road - an ambience so refined, even Gatsby himself would be in awe. Be among the privileged few to indulge in the opulent refurbishment of this five-star retreat, where no expense has been spared to enhance its radiant Golden Age charm with state-of-the-art luxuries. Indulge in a sumptuous breakfast surrounded by rows of lush greenery at The Terrace, or slip into the European-inspired Showroom Bar, where the flicker of the fireplace invites you to favour the fabulous in the form of fine dining and signature cocktails.

Adorned with Art Deco accents and glossy marble finishes, this former Rolls Royce showroom upholds a timeless air of beauty and sophistication, from its rolling staircases to the glistening chandeliers dripping in crystals. This boutique gem offers a lavish retreat in the heart of the city, just a short walk to the tranquil Royal Botanic Gardens, a wander down to the National Gallery of Victoria and a quick tram to the world-famous fine-dining strip of Flinders Street.
offer_address: 379 St Kilda Road, Melbourne, Victoria 3004, Australia

title: Five-Star Melbourne Heritage Elegance with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Embrace century-old grandeur and join celebrities and royalty alike in the hallowed halls of this illustrious Melbourne hotel. Commanding a near-unbeatable position across from the Gold Rush-era Parliament House, next to the famous Princess Theatre and at the top of bustling Collins Street, this five-star hotel couldn’t be closer to the cobblestone laneways, world-famous cafes and vibrant street art for which Melbourne is so renowned.

As the sun sets, savour the charm of a drink at the historic Cricketers Bar, a cherished ritual within the walls of this heritage haven. With previous guests ranging from English and Hollywood royalty to former Australian prime ministers, be drawn in by the opulence of this grand heritage-listed property, world-renowned for its original Victorian decor and as the home of Australia’s longest continual afternoon tea service. Where yesteryear elegance meets unparalleled service, experience a true living legacy at The Windsor.

title: Melbourne: Royal Botanic Gardens High Tea Experience with Sparkling Wine
description:
Jardin Tan shines the spotlight on the art of afternoon tea - and you’re invited to indulge in a mouthwatering experience for two, set within Melbourne’s much-loved Royal Botanic Gardens. Scan your eyes across the sleek décor and be immediately welcomed by this warm and inviting space where you can enjoy a blissful escape away from the bustling streets of Melbourne.

Experience a flavour-packed high tea like no other, with a distinct fusion of Vietnamese and French flavours. As the seasons change, so too will the menu. Your experience will offer a selection of handpicked offerings from the chef, which could include a confit duck fritter, cinnamon and apple frangipane tart and fluffy scones served with lemon curd, chantilly and jam. With sustainability a core focus of the Jardin Tan experience, you can expect to savour organic, biodynamic produce from the gardens of its sister venue, Burnham Beeches, part of the Vue Group. For lovers of all things sweet and savoury, this experience is not to be missed.
offer_address: Royal Botanic Gardens, Birdwood Ave, South Yarra VIC 3141

title: Iconic Melbourne Glamour with Daily Breakfast, Valet Parking & Sky-High Indoor Pool
description:
Enter a world of unparalleled style above Melbourne’s Southbank with a lavish stay at Australia’s leading integrated resort. One of the city’s most chic hotels, in a prime location along the Yarra River, this hotel is a destination within a destination, where world-class hospitality and entertainment await.

Take a dip in the stunning 27th-floor indoor pool with panoramic skyline views, or explore 24 acclaimed restaurants and bars. Pamper yourself with exclusive Crown Spa treatments and discover designer shopping - all just a stone’s throw from Melbourne’s CBD.

You'll have the luxury of deciding where in Melbourne you and your family will be photographed - maybe you'd like to get snapped in style beneath the clocks at Flinders Street Station, under the lush foliage of the Royal Botanic Gardens Victoria or surrounded by technicolour street art. Be guided by your expert photographer on the day, as they capture a series of candid, natural and relaxed moments - including warm smiles and tender hugs shared between you and your loved ones.

This experience's great strength is its flexibility - bring up to eight guests, including infants and children of all ages, and decide on a time and place that suits you. You'll receive 30 edited digital images within seven days of your photoshoot; your captured memories to print, frame and hang.

title: Top-Rated Melbourne Boutique Break in the Heart of Little Italy with Daily Breakfast
description:
There's no stay quite like Zagame’s House, an ultra-chic, super-boutique hotel in the heart of Little Italy and one of Australia's top 25 hotels as voted in Tripadvisor's Best of Best 2021 awards. Sitting proudly on Lygon Street, this design-led den deals out coffee, wine and graffiti in spades, celebrating the best of the city within its art-decked halls.

Start the morning at streetside 1851 Coffee + Kitchen - perch on a stool overlooking Lygon Street as you try Melbourne's unique 'magic' coffee and devour a bowl of breakfast ramen before taking to the streets. A luxe 24-hour gym means you can fit in a workout whenever, but after pounding the pavement, a glass of wine and tapas at Lord Lygon Wine Shop might be the recovery you need. For trips further afield, the CBD is within walking distance, Carlton is your backyard and a rental Fiat called Freya is available for hire - you can even book a private driver using the hotel’s bespoke Maître Z service (charges apply).

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start the morning with daily à la carte breakfast at 1851 Café
- Toast to your escape with a welcome bottle of wine to share
- Sample regional delights with a cheese tasting plate in your room on arrival
- Sleep in with guaranteed 1pm late checkout

**Prefer twin bedding?** Choose the House Twin and enjoy two king single beds.

**Urban upgrade available:** This is the ultimate New York-style 'pad' in the heart of Carlton, boasting even more space (26sqm) and city skyline vistas.

**Tripadvisor** **Travellers’ Choice, Best of the Best 2021** Top 25 Hotels - Australia

title: Novotel Escape in the Heart of Melbourne’s Fashion District with Daily Breakfast, Valet Parking & Nightly Drinks
description:
Between the prestigious thoroughfare of Bourke Street Mall and Collins Street’s sophisticated retail precinct, the well-appointed Novotel Melbourne on Collins offers the perfect place to discover the city's iconic laneways and lattes. Located directly above the upscale boutiques of St Collins Lane, you'll be perfectly placed for a romantic escape or a decadent staycation. From fabulous art galleries and historic museums, to hatted restaurants and pumping sports stadiums, there's always something to explore, with Rod Laver Area, the Sidney Myer Music Bowl and the National Gallery of Victoria all within walking distance.

With the Novotel Melbourne on Collins as your central city retreat, you'll enjoy a hearty buffet breakfast each morning at the Lane Restaurant, showcasing the vibrant food culture of Melbourne with perfectly cooked eggs, the freshest fruits and delightful yoghurt muesli pots - all while overlooking tree-lined Collins Street vistas. Enjoy an extra taste of luxury by dipping into the soothing heated swimming pool and spa, or indulge in a nightly evening drink at the Lane Bar - the perfect venue for a quiet nightcap or an expertly poured martini before a night out exploring Melbourne's many hidden gems.

title: Melbourne's Coolest Boutique Hotel with Daily Breakfast & Wine Bar Credit
description:
Tap into the soul of Melbourne with a boutique stay on iconic Lygon Street at Zagame's House - stylishly straddling the border between historic Carlton and the city's glittering skyline. Currently ranked in Melbourne's top three hotels on Tripadvisor and included in Condé Nast Travelers' 2020 '15 Best Hotels in Melbourne', this beautifully revitalised, designer city pad expertly mixes creature comforts and urban vibes with modern interior design, luxurious amenities, and restored architecture.

Dive into the wine list and indulgent cheese boards in wine bar Lord Lygon, explore the lush Carlton Gardens nearby, work up a sweat in the state-of-the-art fitness centre and experience quintessential Melbourne from this top-rated hotel - it's all within a short stroll or tram ride.

title: Boutique Melbourne CBD Elegance with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks Hour
description:
Embrace Melbourne culture with a decadent stay at this cutting-edge designer retreat, located in the heart of the city's East End Theatre District. Effortlessly capturing Melbourne’s juxtaposing grit and glamour through its stylish design and upscale amenities, this hotel offers a quintessential experience for those seeking a bucket-list stay in Victoria’s vibrant capital.

Head to the hotel’s rooftop terrace for skyline vistas before stepping out onto the surrounding streets to discover hole-in-the-wall cafes, high-end boutiques and an endless network of top-notch restaurants. After a long day of exploring the city, unwind at the Lobby Bar or retreat to your room for a restful night's sleep.
offer_address: 51 Little Bourke Street, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia

vendor_name: Next Hotel Melbourne, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Grand Opening: Manhattan-Inspired Melbourne Stay with Daily Breakfast & A$50 Dining Credit
description:
Step into a world of bespoke sophistication at the vibrant Next Hotel Melbourne, a cosmopolitan sanctuary that crowns the glamorous realm of 80 Collins - a brand-new landmark precinct in the CBD's prestigious 'Paris end', that claims prime real estate among iconic retailers, high-end boutiques, first-class eateries and industry influencers.

Effortlessly redefining the hotel experience through its eclectic design and thought-provoking art by internationally-acclaimed Melbourne artists, this evocative abode embraces elements from its equine past as a Horse Bazaar and fuses them with modern aspects reminiscent of neighbouring China Town's unique energy. It's the signature touches that ascend this retreat to the epitome of luxury; each room and suite is kitted out with invigorating rain showers and the latest Dyson SuperSonic hair dryers, while the plush Dreamweaver beds are dressed in French linen with fluffy waffle throws to ensure a restful nights sleep after days spent exploring.

The heart and soul of Next Hotel Melbourne can be found in its super-sleek dining venues: La Madonna, where a spontaneous menu curated by expert chefs perfectly encapsulates the very best of local produce through provocative dishes, and The Barrel Room, where guests can watch in-house, barrel-aged spirits be decanted and served in style.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Kick start city adventures with daily à la carte breakfast at La Madonna
- Indulge at La Madonna and The Barrel Room with A$50 drink and dining credit per stay
- Celebrate your escape with a welcome bottle of wine
- Toast to new adventures with a signature barrel-aged cocktail per adult
- Enjoy a complimentary glass of wine when you purchase a meal at the stylish La Madonna restaurant
- Sleep in until the last moment with guaranteed late 12pm checkout

**VIP Club Upgrade available:** Upgrade to a Club Room and enjoy exclusive access to the Manhattan-inspired The Club, where you'll be treated to nightly drinks, canapés (6pm-8pm) and select, round-the-clock refreshments and snacks from the Club's chefs.

**Travelling as a group?** Upgrade to a Club Two-Bedroom Suite for up to four guests and be treated to The Club VIP treatment and double the drinks and dining credit with A$100 per suite to share.
location_description: Next Hotel Melbourne, Curio Collection by Hilton
offer_address: 103 Little Collins Street, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia

title: The Langham Melbourne: Exclusive Club Access
description: Discover the magic of Melbourne with a five-star stay in the heart of the city. Wake up in an elegant Executive Room with complete access to the elite Langham Club Lounge and all its benefits. Enjoy daily breakfast spreads, all-day tea, coffee and pastries, daily afternoon tea, daily pre-dinner drinks and hors d’oeuvres, plus AU$25 per person to spend on a buffet dinner at renowned Melba Restaurant and much more.

title: Music-Inspired Melbourne Studios & Apartments near Bird's Basement with Daily Breakfast
description:
Feel the musical heartbeat of Melbourne with a sophisticated stay at these stylish, self-contained apartments and studios, perfectly positioned in Melbourne's CBD. In Singers Lane behind the hotel, you'll find live jazz club Bird's Basement - the partner venue of New York’s famous Birdland - making these art-filled studios and apartments the perfect base for music enthusiasts.

If you're feeling peckish, head to the Mezzanine Restaurant for delectable dishes, work up a sweat at the onsite fitness centre or simply take advantage of the hotel's prime location and explore the city. Hop onboard a tram and check out the Australian Music Vault to gain an insight into the country's musical influences and culture.

title: Grand Opening: Ovolo Designer South Yarra Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Step into the newly unveiled Ovolo South Yarra and prepare for an extraordinary stay, where bold rockstar energy and retro-inspired pop art meets refined sophistication, right in the heart of Melbourne’s coveted cosmopolitan hub. This uber-cool, inner-city escape has it all - and the vibrant atmosphere is anything but dull. The interior itself is reminiscent of Studio 54, and each of the striking rooms pay homage to the golden days of pop, rock and disco legends with vintage album covers and selected suites named after Sonny and Cher or John and Yoko.

Standing tall near the corner of Toorak Road and Chapel Street, this designer escape is perfectly located in the thick of the action, where world-class eateries and designer boutiques rub shoulders with the city’s must-see attractions - Melbourne's NGV and St Kilda's Luna Park are just a short tram or train ride away. When you need a break from the bustling streets, head down to Lona Misa, a restaurant helmed by renowned Melbourne chefs Shannon Martinez and Ian Curley, offering vegan and vegetarian food that is loud and unapologetic, or the bar to sate your thirst with expertly crafted cocktails.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start each day with daily à la carte breakfast at Lona Misa
- Nightly social hour with one house drink each and bar nibbles to share
- Complimentary in-room minibar replenished daily with wine, beer and soft drinks
- Enjoy a complimentary welcome loot bag with surprise snacks
- Rest easy with guaranteed 12pm late checkout

**Longer stay bonus:** Take your stay to the next level with a bonus A$50 food and drinks credit for stays of 4+ nights to indulge a little further.
offer_address: 234 Toorak Road, South Yarra, Victoria 3141, Australia

title: Melbourne Award-Winning Waterfront Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Daily Dining Credit
description:
Step into sophistication at this stylish five-star sanctuary, named Australia’s Leading Hotel 2024 at the World Travel Awards. 

Expect supreme comfort and elegant, minimalist design throughout Pan Pacific Melbourne, when you wake to panoramic views through floor-to-ceiling windows. After a day of discovering Melbourne’s best and brightest spots, kick back for an evening of in-room TV entertainment from your plush bed.

Watch the bustling city roll by from the comfort of your modern room, step out for a visit to shopping haven DFO South Wharf or dive into the exciting happenings of the ever-eventful Melbourne Convention and Exhibition Centre, all easily accessible. 

Just a short stroll down the Yarra River to Melbourne CBD,  Pan Pacific Melbourne is your anchor to the city's world-class entertainment and nightlife. Thanks to a dedicated valet service, 24-hour fitness centre access and your choice of onsite dining options, your Melbourne city break is set to be a breeze.
offer_address: 2 Convention Centre Place, South Wharf, Melbourne 3006, Victoria, Australia

title: Vibrant Five-Star Pullman Stay in the Heart of Melbourne with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
If you're looking for five-star sophistication in the heart of Melbourne, look no further than Pullman Melbourne City Centre. Perfectly positioned off one of the city's main thoroughfares - steps from Melbourne's famed retail district - this elegant hotel beckons you through a hidden laneway entrance into an urban retreat away from the hustle and bustle. Part of the acclaimed Pullman Hotels and Resorts collection, the hotel offers guests a first-class experience through its state-of-the-art amenities and outstanding service.

Treat yourself to breakfast and barista coffee at Eva's Restaurant & Bar, or head to the brand-new Blossom Rooftop Bar - the highest open-air bar in the city - for laidback cocktails and spectacular views over Melbourne's striking skyline. Ready to explore? Melbourne’s laneways, lattes and laidback speakeasies are just moments away, with landmarks such as Flinders Street Station, Federation Square, Parliament House and the National Gallery of Victoria all an easy stroll - or tram ride - away. Venture a little further and Victoria's most renowned sights are within easy reach, including the mighty Dandenong Ranges, Yarra Valley wine region and the windswept beauty of the Great Ocean Road.
offer_address: 265 Little Bourke Street, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia

title: Art Deco Melbourne Heritage Escape Steps from Yarra River Promenade with Daily Breakfast
description:
Follow in the footsteps of celebrities and dignitaries with a stylish city break at Rendezvous Hotel Melbourne, one of Australia's most historic hotels. This heritage-listed property is renowned for its original Victorian decor, combining the charm and nostalgia of yesteryear with a newfound elegance, offering a range of stylish and well-appointed rooms and suites, each thoughtfully designed to provide a restful sanctuary amid the bustling cityscape. Stop by the sophisticated lounge for high tea and enjoy scones, sandwiches and pastries on tiered trays with champagne and teas, or head to The Travellers Bar for handcrafted cocktails and classic dishes with a modern twist.

Sitting on Flinders Street in Melbourne’s CBD, you couldn’t be closer to the action - the cosmopolitan bolthole sits across the road from the iconic Flinders Street Railway Station and is surrounded by the city's dazzling array of bars, galleries and restaurants. The Yarra River and famous shopping precincts of Bourke Street Mall and Collins Street, offering a wide range of retail therapy options, lay just minutes away. Melbourne has something for everyone, and this beautiful hotel puts you in the right place to make the most of your stay.

title: Timeless Elegance at Melbourne’s Most Famous Heritage Hotel
description: Embrace a legacy dating back over a century at the historic The Hotel Windsor, located in the heart of the city’s vibrant theatre and dining district. Immerse yourself in the history of this grande dame - the most famous grand heritage hotel in Australia - and stay in the same hotel as rock stars and Hollywood royalty, including Meryl Streep, Muhammad Ali and Metallica. Be drawn in by historic opulence in a grand Victorian-style Superior Room with a daily Windsor breakfast featuring an à la carte main, one drink per adult at the historic Cricketer’s Bar filled with sporting memorabilia and guaranteed 12pm late checkout.

title: Melbourne Docklands City Break near Southern Cross Station & Marvel Stadium with Daily Breakfast
description:
Nothing beats a bite-sized city stay, perfectly positioned right next to Southern Cross Station. With easy access to Melbourne’s Free Tram Zone, you’re all set to savour great food and good times at Crown Casino, shop ‘til you drop on bustling Swanston Street or catch a game of AFL at Marvel Stadium, located just moments from the hotel.

For those seeking a touch of nature, the beautiful Yarra River is just a short stroll away. After your adventures, return to your room, fitted with everything you need to settle in for the evening, including a kitchenette and an ensuite bathroom. Enjoy a welcome drink, daily buffet breakfast and guaranteed 12pm late check-out.
offer_address: 66 Aurora Lane, Docklands, Melbourne, Victoria 3008 Australia

title: Heritage Melbourne Retreat Near Bourke Street Mall with Daily Breakfast
description:

Explore cultural hotspots like Federation Square's events hub or experience the city's famous culinary culture at countless hidden bars and restaurants. Start your day with a delicious breakfast at MISTER MUNRO and enjoy laidback drinks at Vic’s Bar before discovering Melbourne’s colourful nightlife.

title: Five-Star French-Inspired Sofitel Melbourne Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Wine
description:
Towering over Melbourne's glittering boutiques and chef hatted restaurants, Sofitel Melbourne on Collins graciously invites you to live the French way in five-star style. Taking the crown for the highest hotel views in the city, and ranked in the top 10% of hotels worldwide by Tripadvisor, this très chic retreat boasts stunning vistas at every turn from the award-winning No35 restaurant on the 35th floor, with its modern cuisine and outstanding wine collection, to the elegant suites and rooms.

Prestigiously positioned at the 'Paris end' of Collins Street,  Sofitel Melbourne exudes signature French elegance that encapsulates the surrounding high-fashion galleries, patisseries and bistros, while drawing inspiration from Australian culture through intricate design details and exciting art exhibitions. Step out on the pulsing streets and discover the very best of Melbourne on your doorstep: jump on the gold-trimmed City Circle tram and trundle past major sights like Parliament House and Federation Square, watch a show at Her Majesty's Theatre, only a 10-minute stroll away, or wind around to Hosier Lane to check out the latest creations from the city’s street-art movement.

description: Immerse yourself in the heart of Melbourne's vibrant cityscape with a stay at Urban Apartments Melbourne on Elizabeth, for style and comfort amidst the city's bustling streets. Convenient tram access whisks you away to Marvel Stadium, Southbank and the National Gallery of Victoria. Your apartment-style studio retreat awaits your return, complete with modern comforts and a welcome bottle of wine to toast your Melbourne adventure.

description:
Treat yourself to a Melbourne stay, away from the hustle and bustle of the city, while still being within easy reach of the best cheap eats, beaches, and markets. The hotel is located opposite Albert Park, where you can catch locals enjoying an early morning stroll or watch rowing teams glide across the lake. Just a short walk from the hotel, you can also enjoy the beachfront at St Kilda Esplanade.

The hotel is located opposite the St Kilda tram stop, giving you easy access to the CBD, the Royal Botanical Gardens, Chapel Street, and all the cafes Melbourne is known for. vendor_name: The Savoy Hotel on Little Collins Melbourne
title: Timeless Art Deco Melbourne Stay on Little Collins with Daily Breakfast
description:
Find out why Melbourne is heralded as one of the world's most livable cities with a heritage stay at The Savoy Hotel on Little Collins - a timeless gem located on one of the city's most iconic streets. Situated opposite Southern Cross Station, the hotel's prime position means you won't have to travel far to find exquisite dining experiences, trendy boutiques, cosy cafés, captivating museums or exhilarating sporting events at the likes of nearby Melbourne Cricket Ground or Marvel Stadium.

Constructed in 1866 and retaining its historic charm following an extensive refurbishment, the interior tastefully fuses the best of old and new with a carefully curated mix of contemporary furnishings that match the Art Deco era. Inside, you will find a grand yet welcoming lobby, a cocktail bar and lounge on the ground floor, plus the serene V Hotel Spa and gym to cater to all of your wellness needs. Stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2021 award, this quintessentially Melbourne retreat makes for the perfect hideaway as you soak up the vibrant city streets of Victoria's capital.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Prepare for a full day of exploring with a delicious à la carte daily breakfast
- Toast your escape with a welcome bottle of premium wine on arrival
- Feel like a VIP with a carefully curated Savoy signature gift pack given on arrival
- Enjoy a well-deserved sleep-in with guaranteed 1pm late checkout

**Panoramic-View Upgrade Bonus:** Upgrade to a Corner Plaza Room and enjoy complimentary parking for one vehicle throughout your escape.
location_description: The Savoy Hotel on Little Collins
offer_address: 630 Little Collins Street, Melbourne 3000, Victoria, Australia

title: Melbourne Riverside Luxury with Daily Breakfast
description:
Wake up to the most incredible views over the stunning city of Melbourne and discover all its magic with a two-night stay at the luxurious Pan Pacific Melbourne, located next door to DFO South Wharf and minutes away from CBD. **Looking for added luxury?** Check out the upgrade options including access to the exclusive Pacific Club Lounge.

title: Contemporary Melbourne CBD Stay near Bourke Street Mall with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Drink
description:
Find yourself in the centre of it all at this convenient Melbourne CBD retreat. ibis Melbourne Central sits in the middle of Little Lonsdale Street, putting you in close proximity to the foodie hubs of Hardware Lane, Degraves Street and Chinatown.

Explore the city's laneways, stroll to Queen Victoria Market or shop along Bourke Street Mall. Start and end your day at Pretty Boy Bar & Restaurant, with a hot breakfast to begin your morning and Australian cuisine paired with cocktails for dinner.

title: Melbourne Award-Winning Luxury on the Yarra River with Daily Breakfast & Club Lounge Upgrades Available
description:
Cobblestone laneways, hidden coffee shops and some of Australia’s finest dining: nowhere is better placed to introduce you to Melbourne’s extraordinary spirit than this iconic five-star hotel, effortlessly blending timeless luxury on the southern banks of the mighty Yarra River.

Step into The Langham Melbourne’s grand lobby and enter a world of crystal, marble and hand-carved mahogany, where afternoon tea is high art, hospitality is sacred and signature notes of ginger flower and jasmine hang gently in the air.

After days spent exploring Melbourne’s best, return to the opera-inspired Aria Bar & Lounge for classic cocktails mixed to perfection, or upgrade your stay to enjoy access to the magnificent The Langham Club, newly refurbished and boasting unbeatable views over Flinders Street Station and Southbank.

Luxury this good demands a day spa to match: Chuan Spa offers one of the city’s most beloved oases of calm, with treatments informed by a thousand years of Chinese wellness traditions. Alternatively, head to the hotel’s rooftop for laidback drinks and a lazy dip in the hotel’s swimming pool.
offer_address: 1 Southgate Avenue, Southbank, Melbourne, Victoria 3006, Australia

title: Sky-High Melbourne Apartment-Style Escape with Studio Upgrade & Daily Breakfast
description:
Elevate your escape with a sky-high stay at the Oakwood Premier Melbourne, perfectly placed just minutes away from Southbank's tremendous collection of restaurants and bars. Oakwood’s first Australian property boasts the hotelier’s trademark spread of facilities, including a state-of-the-art gym, co-working space, ballroom and lounge, while the signature floor-to-ceiling windows in each room gift guests dazzling views. Ready for adventure? Cutting-edge technology and a wealth of modern comforts make the 40-storey tower the perfect launchpad for exploring Melbourne’s countless alleys, galleries and boutiques. Return to the hotel's dazzling rooftop restaurant, Strato, for casual fine dining drawing on Australia's soaring culinary heritage and spectacular panoramic views of the city and Port Phillip Bay.

Bet it all on black at Crown Casino, only a ten-minute wander away, hunt for bargains at South Wharf’s direct factory outlets or visit the Melbourne Convention and Exhibition Centre, located just across the road. Melbourne CBD’s lattes and laneways are a short tram trip away, and families will love the hotel’s proximity to historical South Melbourne Market, serving handmade crafts, the finest French patisserie and the country’s most famous dim sims four times weekly.

title: Melbourne Iconic Heritage-Listed Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Step into timeless grandeur and immerse yourself in the splendour that has welcomed both celebrities and royalty at this iconic Melbourne hotel. The Windsor, a Victorian-era treasure, invites you to experience heritage elegance, greeted at the door by impeccably dressed doormen.

With a history of hosting distinguished guests, from British and Hollywood royalty to Australian prime ministers, this grand, heritage-listed property is famed for its original Victorian decor and home to Australia’s longest-running afternoon tea service.

Perfectly located across from the historic Parliament House, next to the renowned Princess Theatre and at the top of bustling Collins Street, the hotel offers unparalleled access to Melbourne’s famous laneways, cafes and vibrant street art.

As evening falls, indulge in the tradition of a drink at the historic The Cricketers Bar, or indulge at Antara, just a five-minute walk from the hotel. Antara’s seasonal menu of small plates invites you to mix and match flavours, perfectly paired with a curated selection of wines.

title: Boutique Melbourne Ovolo Laneways Escape with Daily Breakfast & Complimentary Minibar
description:
Immerse yourself in Melbourne’s colourful culture with a stay brought to you by one of Australia’s coolest boutique brands - Ovolo Laneways. Situated on the corner of Little Bourke Street in the CBD, this eclectic hotel is currently rated among the top 10 hotels in Melbourne on Tripadvisor and allows easy access to the city's art galleries, shopping precincts, sporting arenas and world-class restaurants.

Fully embracing Melbourne’s love of street art, Ovolo Laneways delights with original artworks and splashes of bright colour in the lobby and rooms. Friendly staff embody the city’s easy-going spirit and can help with anything from extra towels to insider tips on the best bars. Post evidence of your nights out with super-speed Wi-Fi - although what happens in Melbourne can stay in Melbourne, of course.
offer_address: 19 Little Bourke Street, Melbourne 3000, Victoria, Australia

title: Melbourne Brand-New Vibrant Southbank Escape with Complimentary Room Upgrade
description:
Immerse yourself in the colourful canvas of Melbourne’s CBD with a stay at Ink Hotel Melbourne Southbank. This eclectic accommodation is brand new to the city and offers fun and playful living in the heart of the vibrant Southbank entertainment precinct. It sits within easy reach of top attractions including Crown Casino, Flinders Street Station and the popular South Melbourne Market.

More than just a hotel, this inner-city abode's unique interior design and commissioned artworks are on display in the elegant rooms and sophisticated Kitchen & Bar, showcasing artisanal fare and local ales. Combining the charm of Melbourne's caffeine-fuelled hotspots and relaxed bars with the city's stencil-stained laneways, Ink Hotel Melbourne Southbank will enchant you from the moment you arrive.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Feel like VIPs with a complimentary room upgrade from The Pocket to The Buddy or The Comfy
- Enjoy a daily express continental breakfast including a large coffee and freshly baked croissant
- Toast your city escape with one complimentary cocktail each at the bar
- Start your escape sooner with early check-in at 1pm, subject to availability
- Stay in the moment with guaranteed 12pm late checkout

title: Melbourne Lively Flinders Lane Escape with Daily Breakfast & Rooftop Cocktails
description:
Beaming 29 stories above the bustling heart of Flinders Lane is a luxuriously fun abode that brings the zing of Southeast Asia to Melbourne. Incredible city panoramas are on offer from all angles, whether with a tranquil dip in the rooftop pool, or sundowners at the Q Rooftop.

A stay here is sure to awaken your senses: admire vibrant hues of pink and blue, synonymous with good fortune, in the uniquely decorated rooms, run your fingers through textural art installations that adorn the walls and taste the explosive flavours of Southeast Asia at Salted Egg.

Making a bold statement on the CBD scene, this eclectic hotel is surrounded by graffitied laneways, high-end restaurants, hole-in-the-wall cafes and more, making it the perfect location to immerse yourself in the city's iconic culture.

title: Brand-New Modern Melbourne Apartment-Style Stay in the Heart of Docklands
description: The perfect city break begins at Nesuto Docklands, with spacious, brand-new one and two-bedroom apartments in the heart of Melbourne's Docklands. There is so much to do right on your doorstep, like shopping at The District Docklands, skating at O’Brien’s Ice House, riding the old school bumper cars at Archie Brothers Cirque Electriq or cruising on the Yarra River with Tramboat Scenic Cruises - the world's only floating tram. Even better, the free 'City Circle Tram' stops just down the road, meaning you can discover the best of the CBD with ease. Spend your days tasting the city's best food and coffee in Flinders Lane, or shop till you drop at Bourke Street Mall and Melbourne Central before returning to Nesuto and putting your feet up.

title: Melbourne Boutique Lancemore Laneway Hotel near Theatre District with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Drink Hour
description:
Embrace Melbourne culture with a luxurious laneway stay at this cutting-edge, designer retreat, located in the heart of the iconic Theatre District and only moments from Chinatown.

Effortlessly capturing Melbourne’s juxtaposing grit and glamour through its stylish design and upscale amenities, this retreat offers a quintessential experience for those seeking a bucket-list-ticking stay in Victoria’s vibrant capital.

Head to the hotel’s rooftop terrace for skyline vistas before stepping out onto the surrounding streets to discover hole-in-the-wall cafes, high-end boutiques and an endless network of top-notch restaurants. Walking distance to the iconic Melbourne Cricket Ground (MCG) and the Australian Open Grand Slam's home Melbourne Park, staying at Lancemore Crossley St. ensures you never miss a beat on the city's sporting scene.
offer_address: 51 Little Bourke Street, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia

title: Legendary Stay at The Hotel Windsor
description: Have an A-List city stay in Melbourne's most iconic hotel, The Hotel Windsor, located in the heart of Melbourne's world-class theatre and dining district. Immerse yourself in the history of the most famous Grand Heritage Hotel in Australia, and stay in the same hotel as rock stars and royalty. Arrive in style with nightly valet parking and enjoy daily AU$20 breakfast credit, one AU$35 credit for The Hotel Windsor’s famous afternoon tea, a Gin & Tonic at the newly-opened Gin & Wine Bar featuring live Jazz on the weekends, a drink at the hotel's Cricketers Bar and a leisurely late check out.

title: Novotel Escape in the Heart of Melbourne with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Panoramic City Views
description:
Cobblestone laneways, hidden coffee shops and some of Australia’s finest dining: this stylish high-rise hotel is the perfect introduction to Melbourne’s extraordinary spirit, with Hardware Lane just metres away and vibrant Bourke Street within easy reach.

Part of the esteemed Novotel brand, the hotel offers supreme comfort and elegant, minimalist design. Wake up to panoramic views from your guaranteed high-floor room through floor-to-ceiling windows, and, after exploring Melbourne's top attractions, return to exceptional facilities, including a fully equipped fitness centre, impressive event spaces and contemporary Italian cuisine at the onsite Pretty Boy Bar & Restaurant.

Whether you’re looking to enjoy an evening at one of the city’s famous comedy clubs, catch a live performance at a historic theatre or indulge in a night out at a trendy bar or nightclub, Novotel Melbourne Central places you at the heart of it all.

title: Melbourne East End Elegance: Theatre District Stay with Rooftop Pool, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Step into Melbourne's cultural heart at this central stay, where the city's theatre district, Chinatown, boutique shopping and major sporting precincts are all just moments from the door. This is your front-row seat to Melbourne's energetic lifestyle, whether you're chasing curtain call at Her Majesty's Theatre or hunting down dumplings on Little Bourke.

At ground level, Bossley Bar & Restaurant brings Melbourne’s iconic food scene indoors, with clever takes on classics using produce sourced from across Victoria. Settle into a green leather booth for a long dinner before the theatre or head down for a generous buffet breakfast that makes the perfect jumping-off point for the day's city adventures.

Head upstairs to the rooftop and swap street-level bustle for sky-high calm - the year-round heated pool is a rare gem in the city, perfect for a morning swim above the skyline. Beaming 29 stories above the bustling heart of Flinders Lane is a luxuriously fun abode that brings the zing of Southeast Asia to Melbourne. Incredible city panoramas are on offer from all angles, whether with a tranquil dip in the rooftop pool, or sundowners at the Q Rooftop.

A stay here is sure to awaken your senses: admire vibrant hues of pink and blue, synonymous with good fortune, in the uniquely decorated rooms, run your fingers through textural art installations that adorn the walls and taste the explosive flavours of Southeast Asia at Salted Egg.

Making a bold statement on the CBD scene, this eclectic hotel is surrounded by graffitied laneways, high-end restaurants, hole-in-the-wall cafes and more, making it the perfect location to immerse yourself in the city's iconic culture.

title: Top-Rated Melbourne Boutique Break in the Heart of Little Italy with Daily Breakfast
description:
There's no stay quite like Zagame’s House, an ultra-chic, super-boutique hotel in the heart Carlton and one of Australia's top 10 hotels as voted in Tripadvisor's Best of Best 2023 awards. Sitting proudly on Lygon Street, this design-led den deals out coffee and wine in spades, celebrating the best of the city within its art-decked halls. Start the morning at streetside 1851 Coffee + Kitchen - perch on a stool overlooking Lygon Street as you get a taste of Melbourne's famed coffee and devour a bowl of breakfast ramen before taking to the streets. A luxe 24-hour gym means you can fit in a workout whenever, but after pounding the pavement, a glass of wine at Lord Lygon Wine Shop might be the recovery you need.

For trips further afield, the CBD is within walking distance, Carlton is your backyard and a rental Fiat called Freya is available for hire - you can even book a private driver using the hotel’s bespoke Maître Z service (charges apply).

title: Melbourne Award-Winning Waterfront Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Daily Dining Credit
description:
Step into sophistication at this stylish five-star sanctuary, named Australia’s Leading Hotel 2024 at the World Travel Awards. Expect supreme comfort and elegant, minimalist design throughout Pan Pacific Melbourne, when you wake to panoramic views through floor-to-ceiling windows. 

Step out for a visit to shopping haven DFO South Wharf or dive into the exciting happenings of the ever-eventful Melbourne Convention and Exhibition Centre, all easily accessible. When you're not out discovering Melbourne’s best and brightest spots, watch the city roll by from the comfort of your luxurious room. 

Just a short stroll down the Yarra River to Melbourne CBD,  Pan Pacific Melbourne is your anchor to the city's world-class entertainment and nightlife. Thanks to a dedicated valet service, 24-hour fitness centre access and your choice of onsite dining options, your Melbourne city break is set to be a breeze.
offer_address: 2 Convention Centre Place, South Wharf, Melbourne 3006, Victoria, Australia

title: Classic Five-Star Melbourne Marriott Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Valet Parking
description:
Allow yourself to be swept away by the undeniable charm and magic of Victoria’s capital with an elegant stay at the five-star Melbourne Marriott Hotel, perfectly placed for inner-city adventures.

Locals will proudly attest that Melbourne rewards those who look beneath the surface - and the hotel’s CBD location on the corner of Exhibition and Lonsdale Street makes it easy to immerse yourself in the endless experiences that await. Whether it's the opening of an award-winning show in the nearby Theatre District, a big-name sporting event at the MCG, discovering a new rooftop bar or the unveiling of the latest exhibition at the NGV, there is no shortage of ways to fill your days.

When you need a moment of reprieve, the property’s stunning facilities and stylish rooms await. Expect gleaming marble bathrooms, an exceptionally comfortable bed, classic furnishings matched with modern accents, plus commanding city views in selected rooms. As for culinary delights, the hotel’s signature restaurant, The Essence, captures the best of modern Australian fare, while Elements Lounge and Bar has long established itself as one of the best cocktail bars in the city.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start each day with breakfast at The Essence restaurant
- Experience the ease of daily valet parking for one vehicle throughout your stay
- Toast your stay with a glass of wine on arrival
- Arrive to a welcome bottle of NV Redbank Emily Brut in your room
- Sleep in and leave feeling recharged with 1pm late checkout

**Travelling with family?** Up to two extra guests (of any age) stay free of charge, sleeping on existing bedding, in Premier and Deluxe Rooms - simply request two double beds when booking, subject to availability.

**City-View Upgrades available:** Upgrade to the Deluxe Room or One-Bedroom Suite and take in sweeping views across Melbourne's skyline. Deluxe Rooms include a bonus box of Chocolatier chocolates on arrival, while One-Bedroom Suites also include A$30 drinks and dining credit per package to spend at The Essence or Elements Lounge and Bar.
offer_address: Corner Exhibition & Lonsdale St, Melbourne VIC 3000, Australia

title: Exclusive Club Access at Pan Pacific Melbourne
description: Wake up to the most incredible views over the stunning city of Melbourne and discover all its magic with a two-night stay at the luxurious Pan Pacific Melbourne, located next door to DFO South Wharf and minutes away from CBD. Enjoy exclusive access to the Pacific Club Lounge with daily breakfast spreads, all-day refreshments, pre-dinner drinks and hors d’oeuvres, plus a $25 dining credit for Dock 37 Bar & Kitchen, a complimentary bottle of red wine with Ganache chocolate and a guaranteed late check out until 2pm.
offer_address: 2 Convention Centre Place, South Wharf, Southbank

title: Coastal Melbourne Escape Minutes from St Kilda Beach with A$25 Dining Credit
description:
Experience the vibrant pulse of St Kilda from this chic hotel, perfectly positioned just moments from the bustling Esplanade and the verdant Catani Gardens. Explore the seaside suburb's famed attractions, from the thrilling Luna Park and picturesque St Kilda Pier to the iconic Espy, a cornerstone of Melbourne's music scene, and the historic Palais Theatre - all just a leisurely stroll from your front door.

Spend your days exploring the eclectic streets of St Kilda, diving into the treasure trove of secondhand clothing stores, leisurely strolling along the golden sands of the beach, or walk through the tree-lined streets and, along the way, discover the numerous art galleries showcasing local talent.

When it's time to relax and refuel, indulge in the local flavours at the much-loved Hub Cafe, renowned for its fresh breakfast delights, and round off your day with a glass of fine wine at the atmospheric Second Act Wine Bar.
offer_address: 35-37 Fitzroy Street, St Kilda, Victoria 3182, Australia
