title: Award-Winning Pan Pacific Melbourne Luxury Hotel with Daily Breakfast & Daily Dining Credit
description:
Step into sophistication at the luxurious Pan Pacific Melbourne. Named Australia’s Leading Hotel 2023 at the World Travel Awards, the Pan Pacific is a stylish five-star sanctuary in the thriving South Wharf district. 

Expect supreme comfort and elegant, minimalist design when you wake to panoramic views through floor-to-ceiling windows, before enjoying your scrumptious daily breakfast. After a day of discovering Melbourne’s best and brightest spots, kick back for an evening of in-room TV entertainment from your plush bed.

Watch the bustling city roll by from the comfort of your modern room, step out for a visit to shopping haven DFO South Wharf or dive into the exciting happenings of the ever-eventful Melbourne Convention and Exhibition Centre. 

Just a short stroll down the Yarra River to Melbourne CBD, the Pan Pacific is your anchor to Melbourne’s world-class entertainment and nightlife. Thanks to dedicated valet service, 24-hour fitness centre access and your choice of onsite dining options, your Melbourne city break is set to be a breeze.
offer_address: 2 Convention Centre Place, South Wharf, Melbourne 3006, Victoria, Australia

title: Sophisticated Eastern Melbourne Escape near Chadstone Shopping Centre with Daily Breakfast
description: For a relaxing Victoria escape, indulge in a stay at PARKROYAL Monash Melbourne, found just half an hour from Melbourne’s bustling CBD. Situated above M-City Shopping Centre and only a 10-minute drive from premium shopping at Chadstone Shopping Centre - Melbourne's 'Fashion Capital' - visitors are well positioned for a getaway filled with exceptional dining, entertainment and ease. Bring your car and venture into the flourishing Dandenong Ranges or the Yarra Valley for a day of fresh air and outdoor natural delights. Once the shopping spree or day of exploring Melbourne's outer regions is complete, wind down with a drink and nibbles at the hotel's wine bar - Enoteca Bar & Lounge - or opt for a dip in the outdoor heated swimming pool.

title: Stylish QT Melbourne Luxury Stay with A$50 Daily Dining Credit & Nightly Rooftop Cocktails
description: Only in Melbourne could you wake up in a converted cinema with the smell of batch-brew coffee rich in the air and eclectic industrial design at your fingertips: it's all on offer with a stay at the iconic QT Melbourne, ranked in the top three hotels in Melbourne on Tripadvisor. Combining the charm of the nearby ‘Paris end' of Collins Street with the edgy art and design of the city's laneways, and with a stunning neon-blue rooftop bar that offers panoramic views, QT Melbourne will enchant you from the moment you arrive.

title: Discover One of Melbourne's Best-Kept Secrets: Docklands Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails (Select Packages Only)
description: DO NOT USE

title: Stylish Novotel Melbourne Escape near South Wharf DFO with Daily Breakfast
description:
With the serene Yarra River on one side and South Wharf's iconic DFO and Melbourne Convention Centre on the other, Novotel Melbourne South Wharf promises a location like none other. Immerse yourself in the colourful canvas of Southbank from this sophisticated hotel which puts premium shopping on your doorstep, with Melbourne's famed outlets, boutiques and malls just meters away. Enjoy access to exceptional facilities including a contemporary lounge and spacious light-filled rooms with views across Port Philip Bay or the captivating city skyline. Round out your days at Mr Carpano Dining + Bar or Allora Café for a well-deserved drink or delicious bite to eat.

More than just a hotel, this inner-city abode is the ideal launchpad to explore the Victorian capital. Nearby, guests will find enchanting caffeine-fuelled hotspots and relaxed bars within the city's stencil-stained laneways. Find yourself a stone's throw from well-regarded restaurants and bars, trendy boutiques, cosy cafés, captivating museums or exhilarating sporting events at the likes of nearby Melbourne Cricket Ground and Marvel Stadium.
offer_address: 7 Convention Centre Pl, South Wharf VIC 3006

title: Award-Winning Langham Melbourne Luxury on the Yarra River with Daily Breakfast & A$50 Dining Credit + Club Upgrades Available
description:
Cobblestone laneways, hidden coffee shops and some of Australia’s finest dining: nowhere is better placed to introduce you to Melbourne’s extraordinary spirit than at this iconic five-star hotel, effortlessly blending timeless luxury and award-winning hospitality on the southern banks of the mighty Yarra River. Step into The Langham Melbourne’s grand lobby and enter a world of crystal, marble and hand-carved mahogany, where afternoon tea is high art, hospitality is sacred and signature notes of ginger flower and jasmine hang gently in the air. After days spent exploring Melbourne’s best, return to the opera-inspired Aria Bar & Lounge for classic cocktails mixed to perfection, or upgrade your stay to enjoy access to the magnificent The Langham Club, newly refurbished and boasting unbeatable views over Flinders Street Station and Southbank.

Luxury this good demands a day spa to match: Chuan Spa offers one of the city’s most beloved oases of calm, with treatments informed by a thousand years of Chinese wellness traditions. Alternatively, head to the hotel’s rooftop for laidback drinks and a lazy dip in the hotel’s swimming pool. When you’re ready to explore, the hotel’s famed pink taxis stand ready to whisk you to wherever you desire, though many of the city’s best delights - including the National Gallery of Victoria, Federation Square and Bourke Street Mall - are an easy walk away.

title: Luxe QT Melbourne Stay with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Only in Melbourne could you wake up in a converted cinema with the smell of batch-brew coffee rich in the air and eclectic industrial design at your fingertips: it's all on offer with a stay at the iconic QT Melbourne, ranked in the top three hotels in Melbourne on Tripadvisor. Combining the charm of the nearby ‘Paris end' of Collins Street with the edgy art and design of the city's laneways, and with a stunning neon-blue rooftop bar that offers panoramic views, QT Melbourne will enchant you from the moment you arrive.

Experience luxury and contemporary style while enjoying daily à la carte breakfast, a welcome bottle of prosecco in-room on arrival, A$25 food and drink credit to use at Rooftop at QT and a luxurious 1pm late checkout.

**Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice:** Ranked #3 hotel in Melbourne.

title: Opulent Park Hyatt Melbourne High Tea with Glass of Victorian Sparkling Wine Per Person & Valet Parking
description:
Located in Melbourne's prestigious 'Paris end', High Tea at Tea Lounge in the opulent Park Hyatt Melbourne promises an experience to remember as you savour three tiers of delectable delights in an Art Deco-inspired setting with floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the hotel’s private Trilogy Garden. Take a seat on comfortable couch-style seating and bask in the ambience with a welcome glass of Victorian sparkling wine in hand as your bespoke high tea is prepared by an expert culinary team and delicately delivered to your table.

Indulge in a traditional assortment of finely cut sandwiches, freshly baked scones served with a selection of jams and double cream, and then settle in for a plate of delightful pastries with a French flair made by award-winning French pâtissier, Chef Pierrick Boyer. Perfect for a languid afternoon or a special occasion, the dedicated culinary team can even make a special menu for expectant mothers, vegetarians or guests requiring a gluten-free high tea. Afternoon tea at the Park Hyatt is a quintessential Melbourne experience full of tradition, celebration, and a tremendous amount of cake. An indulgently warm and delicious occasion, and one not to be missed.

title: Melbourne: 30-Minute Scenic Helicopter Flight over Iconic Landmarks with Sparkling Wine
description:
Lift off and see Melbourne's most iconic landmarks from above on this one-of-a-kind helicopter tour over the city. Prepare to have your breath taken away as you ascend from Moorabbin Airport (MBW) and soar above Melbourne in a scenic loop. Take in some of the city's most recognisable sites, including the MCG, Yarra River, Albert Park, Flemington Racecourse and more. 

After flying above the Shrine of Remembrance, Royal Botanic Gardens, Queen Victoria Market and other famous landmarks, you'll turn toward the coast, gliding above Port Phillip Bay as you take in views of the sandy coastline and glistening ocean. From your vantage point, you'll see all of Brighton's colourful beach boxes and the shipwreck of HMAS Cerberus just off the coast. This exceptional experience will last approximately 30 minutes. Top off the day with a glass of sparkling wine on arrival at the airport, making this trip the ultimate VIP experience.

title: Sophisticated Eastern Melbourne Escape near Chadstone Shopping Centre with A$100 LE Retail Credit & Daily Breakfast
description: For a laidback Victorian escape just an hour outside of Melbourne's bustling CBD, indulge in a stay at PARKROYAL Monash Melbourne. Situated above Clayton's M-City Shopping Centre - just a 10-minute drive from premium shopping at Chadstone Shopping Centre, Melbourne's 'Fashion Capital' - visitors are well positioned for a getaway filled with exceptional dining, entertainment and ease. Bring your car and venture into the flourishing Dandenong Ranges or the Yarra Valley for a day of fresh air and outdoor natural delights. Once the shopping spree or day of exploring Melbourne's outer regions is complete, wind down with a drink and nibbles at the hotel's wine bar, Enoteca Bar & Lounge, or opt for a dip in the outdoor heated swimming pool.

title: Five-Star Pullman Laneway Stay in the Heart of Melbourne CBD with Daily Breakfast
description:
Find five-star elegance in the heart of the city with an escape to the utterly sophisticated Pullman Melbourne on Swanston. Perfectly positioned just off the city's main thoroughfare, this stylish hotel beckons you through a hidden laneway entrance and into an urban retreat away from the hustle and bustle of the vibrant CBD. While there’s plenty to discover beyond the hotel, this luxury oasis will entice you to stay and savour every moment with its state-of-the-art amenities and outstanding service. And, of course, Melbourne's reputation as a dining destination is upheld with mouthwatering global cuisine and innovative cocktails at Eva's Restaurant & Bar.

Part of the acclaimed Pullman Hotels and Resorts collection, Pullman Melbourne on Swanston offers guests a first-class experience whether you're travelling for business or pleasure. Enjoy the fitness centre, make use of the relaxed workspaces, or simply head out to discover Melbourne’s art-filled cobblestone alleys, atmospheric speakeasies and European-style cafés serving Australia's best coffee.
offer_address: 265 Little Bourke Street, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia

title: Vibrant Flinders Lane Melbourne City Break with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Towering 29 stories above the bustling heart of Flinders Lane is Quincy Hotel Melbourne, a luxuriously fun abode that brings the zing of Southeast Asia to Melbourne. A stay here is sure to awaken your senses: inhale the scent of freshly brewed coffee at onsite cafe SingSong, admire vibrant hues of pink and blue, synonymous with good fortune, in the uniquely decorated rooms, run your fingers through textural art installations that adorn the walls and taste the explosive flavours of Southeast Asia at Salted Egg - the hotel's exceptional signature restaurant. Incredible city panoramas are on offer from all angles, whether it's with a tranquil dip in the rooftop pool, or a Quincy Sling at the Hosier Club, floating 28 stories above Flinders Lane.

Vibrant strokes of street art, the rich aroma of freshly roasted coffee, the gentle ding of a passing tram - just step out the doorstep of Quincy Hotel Melbourne and you'll find yourself immersed in the iconic sights and sounds of this vibrant city. Boasting a prime position in the heart of Melbourne's renowned Flinders Lane, this hip hotel is only a short stroll from Southern Cross Station and across the river from Southbank. Whether you consider yourself a foodie, fashionista, or art connoisseur, unforgettable experiences await you.

title: Le Méridien Melbourne Art Deco Luxury with Rooftop Pool & Daily Breakfast (Select Packages Only)
description:
Meet the modern-meets-Art-Deco hotel standing proud on Melbourne's Bourke Street just waiting to be enjoyed: Le Méridien Melbourne is where luxury meets striking design. Combining everything great about Victoria’s vibrant capital from food culture to innovative style, this five-star beauty provides unparalleled views over the glorious CBD from its rooftop pool deck. Steal glimpses of Parliament House’s grandeur, the verdant Fitzroy Gardens and, at night, the sparkling lights of sky-high rises while lazing poolside on a comfortable lounge with your drink of choice in hand from Le Splash Pool Bar.

An ideal base for artistically inclined travellers or for those in the Melbourne for business, the hotel’s collection of sleek and impeccably designed guest rooms promotes a calming atmosphere to help you slow down after busy days. Savor artisan Axil coffee and a light breakfast in the AM at Intermission Café and Bar or buffet breakfast at Dolly Restaurant before exploring Melbourne’s thriving art, culture and shopping scenes. In the evenings, settle in for seasonal dishes with a unique European touch at Dolly Restaurant while sampling premium wines and reminiscing on dreamy days in the city.

title: Fully Refurbished Heritage Escape in the Heart of Melbourne with Daily Breakfast
description:
Follow in the footsteps of international celebrities and dignitaries in one of Melbourne’s most historic escapes: Rendezvous Hotel Melbourne. With previous guests ranging from former Australian ministers to distinguished royals, this heritage-listed property is renowned for its original Victorian décor, combining the charm and nostalgia of yesteryear with a newfound elegance. Sitting on Flinders Street in Melbourne’s CBD, this grand hotel couldn’t be closer to the action - just across the road from Flinders Street Railway Station and surrounded by some of the city’s best-known bars and restaurants. A short wander south takes you to the happening Southbank promenade, while the Melbourne Cricket Ground (MCG), the locals’ preferred place of worship, is just a 15-minute walk away.

Built in 1913, Rendezvous Hotel Melbourne retains its heritage charm, but thanks to a modern refurbishment, it features all the amenities of a refined hotel. Luxurious rooms and suites boast marble bathrooms and bespoke furnishings that encourage total relaxation. Stop by the sophisticated lounge for high tea from Thursday to Sunday and enjoy scones, sandwiches and pastries on tiered trays paired with champagne and teas. Later, pop into the cosy Travellers Bar for handcrafted cocktails and light meals consisting of classic dishes with a modern twist.

title: Contemporary Melbourne Docklands Escape with Heated Rooftop Pool, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Take in Melbourne's vibrant energy with an elegant escape in the heart of the Docklands entertainment and shopping precinct. With The District Docklands on its doorstep and Marvel Stadium a short walk away, this urban sanctuary invites you to spend your days exploring the city streets, shimmering harbourfront or sampling Melbourne's renowned cuisine. Even better, the free City Circle Tram stops in front of the hotel, meaning you can discover the best of the CBD with ease. Spend your days tasting the city's best food and coffee in Flinders Lane, or shop till you drop at Bourke Street Mall and Melbourne Central before returning to your contemporary abode.

In between exploring Australia's culture capital and its surrounds, indulge in a blend of signature Vibe luxury, upscale sophistication and inner-city living. Enjoy a delicious meal at Storehouse Docklands, boasting paddock-to-plate menus celebrating Australia's bold and diverse cuisines, or swim a few laps in the heated rooftop pool. Each evening, make the bar at Storehouse Docklands your first stop before a night out on the town. At the end of each day, Vibe Hotel Melbourne Docklands' impeccable hospitality and cosy, cloud-like beds are waiting to welcome you home.

title: Five-Star French-Inspired Sofitel Melbourne Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Wine
description:
Casting a regal shadow over Melbourne's glittering boutiques and hatted restaurants, Sofitel Melbourne on Collins graciously invites you to live the French way in five-star style. Taking the crown for the highest hotel views in the city, this trés chic retreat boasts towering vistas at every turn - from the award-winning No35 restaurant on the 35th floor, with its modern cuisine and outstanding wine collection, to the elegant suites and rooms, each featuring floor-to-ceiling windows framing the Melbourne skyline and beyond. Prestigiously positioned at the 'Paris end' of Collins Street,  Sofitel Melbourne exudes signature French elegance that encapsulates the surrounding high-fashion houses, patisseries and bistros, while drawing inspiration from Australian culture through intricate design details and exciting art exhibitions.

Step out on the pulsing streets and discover the very best of Melbourne on your doorstep: jump on the gold-trimmed City Circle tram and trundle past major sights like Parliament House and Federation Square, watch a show at Her Majesty's Theatre, located only a 10-minute stroll away, or wind around to graffiti-adorned Hosier Lane to check out the latest creations from the city’s street art movement.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Wake up to daily deluxe, Australian-inspired breakfast at No35 restaurant
- Celebrate your escape with a delicious welcome bottle of De Bortoli Legacy Vintage Release shiraz or sauvignon blanc waiting in your room on arrival
- Marvel at Melbourne city vistas until the very last moment with guaranteed 2pm late checkout
- Take the family: one child (aged 11 years and under) stays free on a rollaway bed with breakfast included

**Club Upgrades:** Enjoy access to Club Sofitel when you upgrade to a Luxury Club Room or Prestige Suite. Benefits include daily signature club breakfast, light midday snacks, alcoholic evening drinks and canapés between 5.30pm and 7.30pm, personalised check-in/checkout and more. Plus, you'll be treated to valet parking and A$50 dining credit per room to spend on room service and the minibar.

**This deal has NO peak surcharges** - travel any time, for the same great price.

title: Melbourne: Lui Bar High-Life Tasting Experience for Two with Gourmet Cheeseboard, Signature Cocktails, Dessert & Bottle of Wine
description:
Hidden high above Melbourne on the 55th floor of the iconic Rialto Towers, Lui Bar celebrates the city’s vibrant and visionary cocktail culture, drawing from an electric blend of past and future to deliver drinks defined by a fearless pursuit of excellence. Step through Lui Bar’s doors and let the opulent décor transport you to Melbourne’s goldrush age, the brief period when it was the wealthiest city in the world. The Lui Bar High-Life Experience is perfect for fervent foodies, amateur mixologists and epicurean adventurers alike, providing a sampling of some of the finest fare Melbourne has to offer.

You’ll be met with a signature cocktail on arrival, the perfect way to start any evening. Once you’ve settled in, tuck into a selection of gourmet cheeses, hand-selected in partnership with a local fromager and presented with accompaniments. Share a handpicked bottle of red or white wine as you indulge in a divine plate of Vue de monde’s famous dessert lamingtons and admire the views of the sparkling city below.
offer_address: Level 55, Rialto Building, 525 Collins St, Melbourne VIC 3000

title: Unique Melbourne Heritage Suites with Chef-Hatted Restaurant, Dining Credit & Daily Breakfast
description:
The ultra-luxurious finds an unlikely home at The Interlude, where jaw-dropping art, reverential experiences and gastronomic delights elevate the standard of Melbourne’s heritage-rich stays. 

An intimate collection of just 19 suites less than 10km from the CBD, the property is home to North&COMMON restaurant, winner of one Chef's Hat at the 2024 Australian Good Food Guide Awards, with a menu focused on the region’s finest produce. 

You'll also find what is perhaps the city's most unique wine bar - a detail-oriented venue with over 500 varieties treasured within converted bluestone cells, one of which was Ned Kelly's former residence. Once you've had your fill of wining and dining, spend some time at the exquisite underground pool, or venture out into the bustling city.

title: Laneway-Inspired Melbourne CBD Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Rooftop Cocktails & Valet Parking
description:
Only in Melbourne could you wake up in a converted cinema with the smell of batch-brew coffee rich in the air and contemporary industrial design at your fingertips. Immerse yourself in eclectic luxury with a stay at the iconic QT Melbourne, where velvet details, low lights and high fashion come together across individually tailored rooms, dining experiences and exclusive rooftop spaces.

Hidden in the heart of Melbourne's laneways, at the 'Paris end' of Collins Street, this boutique escape is all about expecting the unexpected. Experience a local interpretation of the New Orleans French Quarter at Pascale Bar & Grill, or watch the sunset from the expansive Rooftop at QT, the sophisticated cocktail bar sitting high above the hustle and bustle of the CBD below.

Rearing to explore Melbourne's laneways? Pick up a sandwich and coffee to go from Deli QT,  the perfect fuel for a day's adventure. You're just moments away from a world of hidden bars, eclectic boutiques, and stunning street art, with Flinders Street railway station and the National Gallery of Victoria both within easy reach.

title: Grand Opening: Melbourne Apartment Stay Near Queen Victoria Market with Daily Drinks
description:
Be one of the first to stay at the brand-new Veriu Queen Victoria Market, located in the heart of Melbourne's CBD. With Queen Victoria Market on its doorstep and Melbourne Central a five-minute walk away, this urban sanctuary invites you to spend your days exploring market stalls, shopping at the 'Paris End' of Collins Street, enjoying a picnic at Flagstaff Gardens or simply wandering the city streets in search of the perfect Melbourne latte.

In between exploring Australia's cultural capital and its surrounds, enjoy a grab-and-go meal at the Pantry, rejuvenate body and mind at the fitness centre or cool off with a dip in the shimmering pool. Make the Lobby Bar your first stop before a night out on the town, or retreat to your tranquil abode that is fully equipped with everything you could need to relax after your urban explorations.

title: Newly Renovated Pullman Melbourne Escape with Fitzroy Garden Views & Daily Breakfast
description:
Escape to a world of lattes, laneways and leafy gardens with a stay at the newly renovated Pullman Melbourne on The Park. Perfectly positioned between the historic Fitzroy Gardens and mighty Melbourne icons the MCG and Rod Laver Arena, this is the ultimate city break, only a short stroll through the verdant parklands to the city’s bustling CBD. Following a stunning multi-million-dollar renovation, the luxe rooms feature window chaise lounges accentuating showstopping skyline views, with a dazzling suite of stylish facilities to match. Enjoy light refreshments at the high-flying Level 18 Executive Lounge or savour every bite at The Cliveden Bar & Dining, an upscale eatery celebrating Victorian produce, native Australian ingredients and European flair.

Pullman Melbourne on the Park is the perfect base for exploring the city’s many mysteries, marvels and macchiatos, just a stone’s throw from countless world-class restaurants, rooftop bars and electrifying nightlife. Its location is unrivalled - catch a gig or footy match at the nearby sporting and entertainment hub, stroll through the city’s cherished gardens or visit the nearby National Gallery of Victoria and St. Kilda Beach.
offer_address: 192 Wellington Parade, East Melbourne, Victoria 3002, Australia

title: Boutique Melbourne City Stay with Indulgent Three-Course Dinner
description: Discover the magic of Melbourne staying in bespoke elegance at United Places Botanic Gardens, and discover a new level of architecturally-designed luxury. Stay just a short distance from Melbourne’s CBD in the prestigious suburb of South Yarra, a serene neighbourhood with outstanding examples of art deco architecture and historic mansions. Enjoy daily continental breakfast, an in-room three-course dinner from the hotel's chef-hatted restaurant Matilda, a bottle of wine on arrival and a guaranteed 12pm late checkout.

title: Modern Collingwood Stay Minutes from Melbourne CBD with Guaranteed Room Upgrade
description: Explore one of Melbourne's hippest neighbourhoods with a stay at the city's newest accommodation, lyf Collingwood Melbourne. Wander among artists, foodies and creatives, while remaining just 10 minutes from the CBD. The beauty of this hotel is that the private rooms are comfortable, light-filled and modern, while the shared spaces cultivate new friendships from nights spent cooking together in the kitchen to morning greetings over a fresh cup of coffee. Hop on board a tram to the MCG and Marvel Stadium only minutes away, and live your best co-living lyf.

title: Vibrant Five-Star Pullman Stay in the Heart of Melbourne CBD's Shopping & Dining District with Daily Breakfast
description:
If you're looking for five-star sophistication in the heart of Melbourne, look no further than Pullman Melbourne on Swanston. Perfectly positioned just off one of the city's main throughfares - steps from Bourke Street, Melbourne's famed retail district - this elegant hotel beckons you through a hidden laneway entrance and into an urban retreat away from the hustle and bustle of the CBD. Part of the acclaimed Pullman Hotels and Resorts collection, the hotel offers guests a first-class experience through its state-of-the-art amenities and outstanding service. 

Treat yourself to smashed avo' breakfasts and good coffee at Eva's Restaurant & Bar, or head to brand-new Blossom Rooftop Bar for laidback cocktails and spectacular views over Melbourne's striking skyline. Ready to explore? Melbourne’s laneways, lattes and laidback speakeasies are just moments away, with landmarks such as Flinders Street Station, Federation Square, Parliament House and the National Gallery of Victoria all an easy stroll - or tram ride - away. Venture out a little further and Victoria's best-loved places are within easy reach, including the mighty Dandenong Ranges, Yarra Valley wine region and the windswept beauty of the Great Ocean Road.
offer_address: 265 Little Bourke Street, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia

title: Grand Opening: Chic Melbourne Apartment Escape by Peppers
description: Be among the first to experience Melbourne’s newest hotel experience with the grand opening of Shadow Play by Peppers. This avant-garde accommodation offers chic apartment living in the heart of Melbourne’s vibrant Southbank entertainment precinct, within easy reach of all Melbourne’s best attractions and hidden delights. Treat yourself to a getaway with your other half, a group of friends or the family and explore this amazing city in style. Includes daily à la carte breakfast, daily valet parking, a Victorian wine and produce tasting at Edwin Wine Bar & Cellar, a welcome cocktail and macaroons on arrival, a guaranteed 12pm late checkout and much more.

title: Melbourne Boutique Laneway Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Drinks
description:
Towering 29 stories above the bustling heart of Flinders Lane is Quincy Melbourne, a luxuriously fun abode that brings the zing of Southeast Asia to Melbourne. 

Making a bold statement on the CBD scene, this eclectic hotel is surrounded by graffitied laneways, high-end restaurants, hole-in-the-wall cafés and more, making it the perfect location to immerse yourself in the city's iconic culture. A stay at Quincy Melbourne guarantees to awaken your senses: inhale the scent of freshly brewed coffee at onsite café SingSong, admire vibrant hues of pink and blue in the rooms, synonymous with good fortune, run your fingers through textural art installations that adorn the walls and taste the explosive flavours of Southeast Asia at Salted Egg - the hotel's exceptional signature restaurant. Plus, a tranquil dip in the rooftop pool offers incredible cityscape panoramas. Elevate your experience with a Quincy Sling at the Q Club floating 28 stories above Flinders Lane and take in the city views.

title: Melbourne CBD Escape near Queen Victoria Market & Bourke Street Mall
description:
Discover the vibrant heart of Melbourne’s CBD at the ibis Melbourne Hotel and Apartments. Set in an optimal location to explore the city's best attractions, this hotel is the perfect base for those seeking a city adventure. Start your days with a classic Melburnian coffee and hearty breakfast at the ibis Kitchen buffet. Take a stroll down to the famous Queen Victoria Markets, indulge in delectable Italian fare on Lygon Street or find your way to Bourke Street Mall for world-renowned shopping.

Trains, buses and trams connect you to surrounding suburbs including Richmond, Carlton and South Yarra where more food, drink and entertainment awaits. After long days spent exploring the city’s landmarks, sit back and relax with your preferred drink in hand. The central location and large conference spaces for meetings also make it the ideal spot for those in town on business. Enjoy life as a city slicker at the ibis and relax knowing you're coming back to a cosy room after a long day on the town.

title: Melbourne Peppers One- & Two-Bedroom Apartment Stay in the Heart of Southbank with Daily Breakfast & A$50 Dining Credit
description:

More than just a hotel, this inner-city abode's unique interior design, cosmopolitan ambience and avant-garde flourishes echo throughout the architecture, offering the perfect base to explore romantic rooftop bars, art-splashed laneways and upscale boutiques. Return to light-filled, self-contained apartments - each featuring fully equipped kitchens, spacious living areas, laundries and spectacular views - and sample Victorian-focused wines, hand-selected by world-renowned sommeliers, at Edwin Wine Bar and Cellar.

Travelling with a group? The hotel’s spacious two-bedroom apartments are perfectly suited to families and friends. Laze by the hotel’s shimmering pool, spend cooler evenings by the fireplace in the hotel’s sleek rooftop garden space or savour mastercraft cocktails hand-tailored to each guest at The Cloakroom. A sauna and steam room are also on offer, perfect for unwinding after a busy exploring Melbourne’s best attractions, including the Royal Botanic Gardens, The Shrine of Remembrance or Melbourne Arts Centre. Whether it’s a romantic escape or a fun-filled city break, you’ll feel right at home.

Explore cultural hotspots like Federation Square's events hub or experience the city's culinary scene at countless hidden bars and restaurants. Spend your days tasting the city's best food and coffee in Flinders Lane, or shop till you drop at Bourke Street Mall and Melbourne Central before returning to your contemporary abode.

Enjoy a delicious, discounted meal and daily breakfast at Storehouse Docklands, boasting paddock-to-plate menus celebrating Australia's bold and diverse cuisines, or swim a few laps in the heated rooftop pool. Each evening, make the bar at Storehouse Docklands your first stop before a night out on the town or take the whole family out for some city fun.

Effortlessly redefining the hotel experience through its eclectic design and thought-provoking pieces by internationally acclaimed Melbourne artists, this evocative abode embraces elements from its equine past as a Horse Bazaar and fuses them with modern aspects reminiscent of neighbouring China Town's unique energy. It's the signature touches that take this retreat to the epitome of luxury - each room and suite is kitted out with invigorating rainshowers and the latest Dyson SuperSonic hair dryers, while the plush DreamWeave beds are dressed in French linen with fluffy waffle throws to ensure a restful night's sleep after days spent exploring. The heart and soul of Next Hotel Melbourne can be found in its super-sleek dining venues: La Madonna, where a spontaneous menu curated by expert chefs perfectly encapsulates the very best of local produce through provocative dishes, and The Barrel Room, where guests can enjoy house-distilled, barrel-aged spirits.

description: Follow in the footsteps of celebrities and dignitaries with a stylish city break at Rendezvous Hotel Melbourne, one of Victoria's most historic escapes. Step out on the pulsing streets and discover the very best of Melbourne on your doorstep: jump on the gold-trimmed City Circle tram and trundle past major sights like Parliament House and Federation Square, catch a show at Her Majesty's Theatre, located only a 10-minute stroll away, or wind around to graffiti-adorned Hosier Lane to enjoy a cup of specialty coffee as you check out the latest creations from the city’s street art movement.

This super-cool, inner-city retreat has it all - stylish interiors are reminiscent of former nightclub Studio 54, and each striking room pays homage to the golden days of pop, rock and disco legends and suites named after music's most iconic pairings, including Sonny and Cher and John and Yoko.

Located near the corner of Toorak Road and Chapel Street, this designer escape is in the thick of the action, where chef-hatted restaurants, café royalty, and designer boutiques rub shoulders with the city’s must-see attractions - NGV Melbourne, Federation Square and St. Kilda's Luna Park are only a short tram or train ride away. When you've had your fill of stencil-stained laneways, head down to the onsite Lona Misa restaurant, helmed by renowned Melbourne chefs Shannon Martinez and Ian Curley. Here, tuck into delicious vegan and vegetarian food that is loud and unapologetic, or sate your thirst with expertly crafted cocktails at the hidden speakeasy Backroom.

description: The best of Melbourne is right on your doorstep from the elegant Radisson on Flagstaff Gardens Melbourne. title: Unique Melbourne Heritage Suites with Chef-Hatted Restaurant, Sommelier-Led Wine Tasting & Daily Breakfast
description:
The ultra-luxurious finds an unlikely home at The Interlude, where jaw-dropping art, reverential experiences and gastronomic delights throw the needle forward for the standard of Melbourne’s heritage-rich stays. An intimate collection of just 19 suites operating less than 10km from the CBD, the property is home to North&COMMON restaurant, winner of one Chef's Hat at the 2024 Australian Good Food Guide Awards, with a menu focused on the region’s finest produce. You'll also find what is perhaps the city's most unique wine bar - a detail-oriented venue with over 500 varieties treasured within converted bluestone cells, one of which was Ned Kelly's former residence. Below floor level lives a spectacular candle-lit pool available for private therapeutic bathing, elevated wellness experiences and poolside drinks. For almost 200 years, this was a place people dreamed of escaping. Now, it’s a place you’ll never want to leave.

A decade-long labour of love, this visionary transformation of a corner of the former Pentridge Prison is adaptive reuse at its absolute finest. Long gone are the harsh and cold interiors - the original walls now encapsulate a vibrant space characterised by artisan touches, fearless design and bespoke offerings. From the complimentary turndown wine and truffle service to the treatment of the smiling hosts, once you step through the doors of The Interlude, you’ll wish your sentence was longer.

title: Melbourne Laneway Escape with Rooftop Pool
description:
Nestled on Melbourne's iconic Flinders Lane is the stylish Quincy Melbourne, a luxuriously fun abode with Southeast Asian flare. Making a bold statement on the city scene, this eclectic hotel is surrounded by graffitied laneways, high-end restaurants, and hole-in-the-wall cafes.

A stay at Quincy Melbourne guarantees to awaken your senses. Breathe in the scent of freshly brewed coffee at onsite cafe SingSong, admire vibrant hues of pink and blue in the rooms, synonymous with good fortune, run your fingers through textural art installations that adorn the walls, and taste the explosive Southeast Asian flavours of the hotel's signature restaurant, Salted Egg. Elevate your experience with a dip in the rooftop pool or a Quincy Sling at Q Club, where you can take in the city views.

title: Stylish Melbourne Apartment Stay
description:
Live like a Melbourne local in a stylish apartment at Quest St Kilda Road, conveniently located on one of the city’s most iconic tree-lined boulevards, St Kilda Road - moments from the lush greenery of the Royal Botanic Gardens. Pairing modern hotel-style facilities with the freedom of a self-contained apartment, this is a sleek home-away-from-home. Discover one of Australia's most popular cities, where stencil-stained laneways and lucrative alleys conceal a myriad of vibrant bars, celebrated restaurants, relaxed pubs, and caffeine-fuelled hotspots.

Spend your days exploring the Royal Botanic Gardens and Shrine of Remembrance, discovering buzzing Chapel Street in South Yarra, shopping up a storm at the designer boutiques of Collins Street in the CBD, or dining at Melbourne institutions such as MoVida, Maha and Chin Chin.

title: Five-Star Melbourne Grand Hyatt Stay
description:
A luxurious stay awaits at the five-star Grand Hyatt Melbourne - an iconic hotel prestigiously located among the fine-dining restaurants and high-end boutiques of the city's upmarket Collins Street. Guests can expect exemplary service and exquisitely designed rooms, each featuring Italian marble bathrooms and plush king beds draped with the finest Egyptian cotton. With many of Melbourne's top attractions - including the fabulous theatre district - only a short walk away, the Grand Hyatt is the perfect base for a lavish weekend in one of the world's best cities.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Begin each morning with delicious daily breakfast
- Relax in your stylish room with a complimentary bottle of wine on arrival
- Explore until the very last moment with leisurely 2pm checkout

title: Top-Rated Ovolo Laneways Melbourne Escape
description: Immerse yourself in Melbourne’s creative culture during an escape at the top-rated Laneways by Ovolo - a designer wonderland inspired by the hidden laneways and street art of the CBD's iconic canvas. Nestled amid popular brunch spots, stylish bars, live music venues, theatres and fashionable boutiques, this eclectic hotel puts you within walking distance of the area’s hottest spots, plus offers easy access to Melbourne's extensive network of trams and trains.
offer_address: 19 Little Bourke Street, Melbourne 3000, Victoria, Australia

title: Melbourne Docklands Stylish Apartment Stay
description:
Experience the best of Melbourne’s CBD in a stylish apartment at Quest Docklands, conveniently located in the city’s buzzing Docklands area. Pairing modern hotel-style facilities with the freedom of a self-contained apartment, this is a stylish home-away-from-home, where you can rest in complete comfort after long days of exploring.

Discover one of Australia's most popular cities, where stencil-stained laneways and lucrative alleys conceal a myriad of vibrant bars, celebrated restaurants, relaxed pubs and caffeine-fuelled spots. Spend your days shopping up a storm at DFO South Wharf and The District Docklands precinct, and evenings dining in the restaurants lining the waterfront. Perhaps see Melbourne at its finest and enjoy a convenient location right next to Marvel Stadium, so you can enjoy a pie and beer at the footy before returning to the contemporary comfort of your stylish abode.

title: Five-Star Melbourne Riverside Luxury
description:
Wake to breathtaking views of the Melbourne skyline when you treat yourself to a luxurious stay at the five-star Pan Pacific Melbourne ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. 

A haven of tranquillity boasting some of the best panoramic vistas of the Yarra River, Port Phillip Bay, and city skyline, Pan Pacific Melbourne is a stylish oasis adorned in designer artwork. Inside you'll find a 24-hour gym, a contemporary restaurant serving dishes highlighting Australia's fresh local produce, and a dedicated concierge team on hand to help you discover the best Melbourne has to offer. Discover Melbourne's hidden laneways and rooftop bars staying in a privileged position just minutes from the centre of the bustling city on the banks of its iconic river, the Yarra.
offer_address: 2 Convention Centre Place, South Wharf, Melbourne 3006, Victoria, Australia

title: Award-Winning Melbourne Radisson Stay
description: If you’re looking for a sophisticated city stay in the heart of Melbourne, Radisson on Flagstaff Gardens is the answer. Located on the doorstep of Melbourne’s oldest market, the iconic Queen Victoria Market, and immediately opposite the leafy Flagstaff Gardens, this sleek hotel sits in the Free Tram Zone, within walking distance of Flagstaff Station. Enjoy world-renowned Radisson service and discover Melbourne’s world-class shopping, coffee and gastronomy with ease.

title: Top-Rated QT Melbourne Luxury
description: Nowhere does quirky five-star luxury quite like the iconic QT Melbourne - currently rated in Tripadvisor’s top three hotels in Melbourne. Located in a restored Greater Union cinema complex with its own hidden laneway, a stunning neon-blue rooftop bar that offers panoramic views and an enviable location close to Chinatown and Melbourne Central, QT Melbourne is ideal for a central city break.

vendor_name: The Savoy Hotel on Little Collins Melbourne
title: Art Deco Melbourne Stay
description: Find out why Melbourne is heralded as one of the world's most livable cities with a heritage stay at The Savoy Hotel on Little Collins. Situated opposite Southern Cross Station, the hotel's prime position means you won't have to travel far to find exquisite dining experiences, trendy boutiques, cosy cafes, captivating museums or exhilarating sporting events at the likes of nearby Melbourne Cricket Ground. Inside, you'll find a grand yet welcoming lobby, a cocktail bar and lounge on the ground floor, plus the serene V Hotel Spa and gym to cater to all of your wellness needs. This historically modern, quintessentially Melbourne property makes for the perfect hideaway as you soak up the vibrant city streets of Victoria's capital.
location_description: The Savoy Hotel on Little Collins
offer_address: 630 Little Collins Street, Melbourne 3000, Victoria, Australia

title: Retro-Cool Melbourne Ovolo Escape with Speakeasy Bar
description: Embrace the extraordinary with an escape to Ovolo South Yarra, where raw rockstar energy meets designer sophistication in the beating heart of cosmopolitan Melbourne. Located near the corner of Toorak Road and Chapel Street, this super-cool, inner-city retreat has it all - tuck into delicious vegan and vegetarian fare at Lona Misa, sate your thirst at hidden speakeasy Backroom or step out of the hotels doors and find yourself among the city's dazzling spread of bars, restaurants and clubs.
offer_address: 234 Toorak Road, South Yarra, Victoria 3141, Australia

title: Melbourne Southbank Apartment Break
description:
Find yourself in the heart of Melbourne’s stylish Southbank at Adina Apartments Hotel Melbourne Southbank. You couldn’t ask for a better-connected location - Southbank’s bevy of high-end restaurants and bars are an easy walk, and you’re never too far from a perfectly brewed, classic Melbourne coffee. 

Immerse yourself in the city’s dynamic art scene with the National Gallery of Victoria and the Arts Centre Melbourne a stone’s throw away, while the CBD’s plethora of shops, restaurants, and laneway bars are just across the Yarra. When you’re done exploring the city, the hotel welcomes you back, promising gorgeous city views, a heated indoor lap pool, and an onsite café for when you’re feeling peckish.

title: Melbourne Riverside Escape
description: Stay on the banks of the iconic Yarra River, on the fringe of the sought-after suburb of Richmond, at Amora Hotel Riverwalk Melbourne. Whether you’ve come to dine, shop or don your footy scarf, this slick inner-city suburb will keep you endlessly entertained, with Bridge Road's shopping district within walking distance and the vibrant MCG around a 10-minute drive from the hotel. A stone’s throw from Melbourne CBD's laneways and boutiques, this modern hotel is the ideal place to stay in Victoria's capital. Use the hotel's complimentary mountain bikes to venture to the nearby suburbs of Hawthorn, Kew and South Yarra, or trace the Yarra trail outside your doorstep into the city and beyond.

title: Melbourne Boutique Escape Moments from Queen Victoria Market
description:
Stay in the heart of Melbourne’s CBD at Jasper Hotel, a refurbished urban sanctuary enviably located on Elizabeth Street. With Queen Victoria Market on its doorstep and Melbourne Central a five-minute walk away, this hotel invites you to spend your days exploring market stalls, shopping at Bourke Street Mall, enjoying a picnic at Flagstaff Gardens, or simply wandering the city streets in search of the perfect cup of Melbourne coffee.

In between exploring Australia's cultural capital, spend time relaxing in this stylish hotel. Every evening, between 4pm and 6pm, Jasper Kitchen hosts happy hour, which makes for a great first stop before a night out on the town. The tranquil indoor courtyard offers the perfect place to relax with a cup of tea in between your urban explorations.

title: Central Melbourne Riverside Escape
description: Absorb the urban essence of cosmopolitan Melbourne with a stylish stay at Vibe Hotel Melbourne, in the heart of the CBD. Rising 24 storeys from its heritage base and boasting a prime position, this urban retreat is at the heart of all things Melbourne. The hotel boasts a luxurious swimming pool, fitness centre and sleek eatery-hangout St Marks Road Co.,  and within just a 15-minute stroll you will be sipping drinks on Southbank, checking out the fascinating Immigration Museum or grabbing pastries at Lune Croissanterie.

title: Elegant Stay in Melbourne's Paris End
description:
Live like rock stars and Hollywood royalty at the most famous heritage hotel in Australia, the Hotel Windsor - an architectural gem steeped in Victorian-era history that commands a near-unbeatable position in the sophisticated 'Paris End' of Melbourne's CBD.

The grand doors of this award-winning landmark hotel have welcomed A-list celebrities from across the globe including Meryl Streep, Muhammad Ali, Metallica and more, drawn to the property's historic opulence, modern comforts and exceptional service. Unwind in fluffy bathrobes in your immaculately designed Superior Room or step out onto the bustling city streets to explore Melbourne's cobblestone laneways, world-famous coffee houses and high-end restaurants - all within easy reach.

title: Boutique Melbourne Botanic Gardens Stay
description:
Discover the magic of Melbourne and experience a new level of luxury at United Places Botanic Gardens. Set in the prestigious suburb of South Yarra, a serene neighbourhood with outstanding examples of Art Deco architecture and historic mansions, you’ll be placed just a short distance from Melbourne’s CBD and steps from wonderful boutiques, cafés and restaurants as well as the city’s lush Royal Botanic Gardens.

This one-of-a-kind hotel opened in 2018 with a vision to pioneer a new level of luxury accommodation. Overthrowing the dated hotel norms, the United Places team will be as present or discreet as you please during your stay whilst still ensuring all needs are catered for. With a unique marriage of spacious and opulent rooms with premium amenities, bespoke concierge service and ultra-modern facilities including the chef-hatted Matilda restaurant - serving contemporary Australian food cooked over an open fire and hot coals - this lavish urban retreat is the perfect choice for a city escape in one of Melbourne's most upscale locations.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Wake up to daily continental breakfast
- Take a bit of United Places home with you with a complimentary tote bag
- Enjoy a guaranteed 12pm late checkout to make the most of your final day

**Travelling with friends or family?** Upgrade to an ultra-spacious Garden Suite Two Bedroom, spread over 86sqm and offering spectacular 180-degree views of the Royal Botanic Gardens and Melbourne's iconic skyline from floor-to-ceiling windows, valid for up to four people.

title: Melbourne Art Deco Beachside Escape
description:
You are invited to experience Melbourne’s vibrant beachside neighbourhood, St Kilda, from the iconic The Prince Hotel - home to luxe hotel rooms and a multitude of venues, including Melbourne’s best-known band room. Occupying a large and beautifully maintained Art Deco building right on Acland Street, The Prince Hotel takes you to the heart of this bayside suburb, minutes from the shores of St Kilda beach and a short stroll from the restaurants, pubs and bars that dot the esplanade.

Drawing from the property’s historic architecture and beachside location, each room has been created to feel like a calming oasis that contrasts the bustling streets nearby. Subtle-yet-delightful pops of colour, including cool mint hues and dusty pink highlights, have been expertly matched with modern furnishings to tie the whole look together. An icon of St Kilda, the hotel, ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, is home to a plethora of dining venues and a rooftop beer garden, where you can admire spectacular sunsets over Port Phillip Bay. Immerse yourself in a world of minimalist luxury, modern design, custom furniture and unique sculptures crafted by local artists. Whether you are a Victorian local seeking an urban escape by the water or a guest visiting from further away, you will fall in love with the charismatic atmosphere of St Kilda.
offer_address: 2 Acland St St Kilda VIC 3182 Australia

title: Boutique Melbourne City Break
description: You could not be better placed to discover Melbourne than a stay at View Melbourne, situated on St Kilda Road’s tree-lined boulevard and ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. Offering an unrivalled level of comfort and sophistication, the hotel is a testament to the hallmarks of its brand: simple elegance, cultivated comfort, unmatched service, inspired interiors and expert design. With so much to discover on the doorstep, you will surely want to get out and explore. Thankfully, many attractions are only a short tram ride away, including Federation Square, Chapel Street, Bourke Street and the Royal Botanic Gardens.

title: Five-Star Melbourne CBD Escape with Level 25 Restaurant & Lap Pool
description:
Be one of the first to experience Hyatt Centric Melbourne, an elegant brand-new five-star city sanctuary. Flaunting minimalist design, exceptional dining and a strong sustainability ethos, this ultra-cool oasis is synonymous with Melbourne's iconic attributes: art, design and an unbeatable food scene. In a prime CBD location, Hyatt Centric Melbourne offers a collection of stylish rooms with five-star amenities. Glide up to the Level 25 Restaurant and Bar and introduce yourself to stunning views across Melbourne through floor-to-ceiling panoramic windows, unwind in the hotel's relaxing 25-metre lap pool, or order room service to your dreamy room while you gaze across Melbourne skyline.

When it's time to explore, pick up one of the city's best coffees at the onsite Allie Lane and head to Southbank's shopping district, stroll through Flinders Lanes graffitied laneways, or hop on the City Circle tram and trundle your way past museums, monuments and open green spaces.

title: Boutique Brighton Grand Penthouse: Grand Five-Star Stay for up to Six Guests in Melbourne's South-East
description: Experience a taste of coastal luxury at the Boutique Brighton Grand Penthouse, a chic retreat in the heart of Brighton in Melbourne's south-east. This stylish penthouse is moments from the eclectic collection of boutiques and cafes along Church Street, and a 20-minute walk from Brighton Beach and its iconic colourful bathing boxes. Indulge in this property's three generously appointed bedrooms, three marble bathrooms and chic French doors opening onto a private garden.

title: Bestselling French-Inspired Sofitel Melbourne Luxury with Sky-High Restaurant
description:
Experience the epitome of sophistication with a stay at this five-star city retreat, nestled in the Paris end of Melbourne's CBD. Towering over the city's premier shopping district, Sofitel Melbourne on Collins offers unrivalled access to high-end boutiques, world-class theatres and gourmet dining options. After a day of exploring, retreat to your plush room boasting panoramic views of the city skyline, or savour a cocktail at the chic Atrium Bar on 35.

Venture beyond the hotel to discover Melbourne's vibrant arts scene, with the National Gallery of Victoria and Arts Centre Melbourne just a short stroll away. For food lovers, a visit to the nearby Queen Victoria Market is a must, where you can sample the city's finest fresh produce and artisanal treats. Fitness enthusiasts can maintain their routine at the hotel's state-of-the-art gym, or take a leisurely jog along the picturesque Yarra River.

title: Melbourne Self-Contained Apartment Luxury in the Heart of the CBD
description: Stay among the bustling streets of Melbourne's CBD at the sleek and sophisticated Oaks Melbourne on Collins Suites, ideally located on popular Collins Street close to the city's efficient trams and trains. Right outside your door, you'll find a plethora of incredible dining and shopping opportunities, including the lively Bourke Street Mall just a 10-minute walk away. Between moments exploring the famous landmarks and destinations in the CBD, return to your hotel and make use of the convenient facilities, including a steamy sauna and well-equipped fitness centre.

title: Vibrant Melbourne Southbank Self-Contained Apartment Escape with Indoor Heated Pool, Spa & Onsite Restaurant
description:
Experience Melbourne's vibrant arts scene from this stylish hotel, perfectly positioned in Southbank's cultural heart. Just a short stroll from the renowned National Gallery of Victoria and the Arts Centre Melbourne, this hotel is your gateway to the city's best. After a day of exploring, return to the comfort of your spacious self-contained apartment or enjoy a leisurely swim in the indoor heated pool.

Savour local flavours at the Mezzi Bar and Kitchen restaurant, or explore the city's famed culinary scene, with Southbank's renowned eateries just moments away. For a touch of green, the verdant Royal Botanic Gardens are a leisurely walk away, offering a tranquil retreat.

title: Southbank Escape in Melbourne's Arts Hub
description: Lose yourself in fascinating museums, upscale restaurants and riverside bars when you stay at Holiday Inn Express Melbourne Southbank, an IHG Hotel. Located in the arts hub of Melbourne, you'll find the National Gallery of Victoria, Arts Centre Melbourne and the Australian Centre for Contemporary Art right outside your hotel's doors. Before heading out to explore, grab a bite to eat in the Great Room dining area, or work up a sweat in the fitness centre.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Melbourne Southbank, an IHG Hotel

title: Stylish Fully Furnished Melbourne CBD Apartments near Bourke Street Mall
description: Surrounded by the hustle and bustle of the invigorating CBD, the sophisticated Adina Apartment Hotel Melbourne is the ideal base from which to explore Melbourne to your heart’s content. With eclectic fully furnished apartments offering spectacular city views, the hotel creates a home-away-from-home to come back to after a long day of shopping, theatre or wining and dining. Just steps from your apartment, there’s an endless variety of gourmet dining options and award-winning bars to sample, not to mention Melbourne's world-famous coffee culture. Destinations such as the Shrine of Remembrance and the National Gallery of Victoria are only a short distance away - as is anything you could desire in this vibrant city, thanks to the hotel’s central location.

title: Iconic Five-Star Heritage-Listed Melbourne Stay
description:
Follow in the footsteps of international celebrities and dignitaries in the hallowed halls of Melbourne’s grandest hotel: The Hotel Windsor. With previous guests ranging from English and Hollywood royalty to former Australian prime ministers, this five-star, heritage-listed property is world-renowned for its original Victoriana décor and as the home of Australia’s longest continual afternoon tea service. Sitting at the top of Spring Street, in Melbourne’s CBD, this grand hotel couldn’t be closer to the action - it’s opposite Parliament House and surrounded by some of the city’s best-known bars and restaurants.  A short wander north gets you to the happening neighbourhoods of Fitzroy and Collingwood, while the Melbourne Cricket Ground (MCG), locals’ preferred place of worship, is just a 15-minute walk away.

Built in 1883, The Hotel Windsor retains its heritage charm but, thanks to a few updates, includes all the modern amenities of a five-star hotel. Luxurious rooms and suites feature marble bathrooms and generous furnishings that encourage total relaxation. Dining onsite is decadent, with afternoon tea offered in the classic dining room, and lunch and dinner inspired by classic English pub fare served in the cosy Cricketers Bar. The hotel also offers access to coveted dining destinations - modern Southeast Asian restaurant SUNDA and contemporary Australian fine dining restaurant ARU are both within the hotel's hospitality group and just a short walk away. Speak with the front desk to book your table.

title: Contemporary Apartment Stay in the Heart of Melbourne
description:
Embrace apartment-style living in one of the world’s most livable cities with a stay at Citadines on Bourke Melbourne. Perfectly positioned in the middle of the city’s vibrant CBD, this stylish apart-hotel is seconds from world-class dining, drinking and shopping experiences, but maintains peacefulness and privacy. The Melbourne Cricket Ground and Melbourne Park, home to the Australian Open, are within a half-hour wander, while a nearby tram stop makes exploring the suburbs of St Kilda, Carlton and Fitzroy stress-free. Situated in the heart of the theatre district, Citadines on Bourke Melbourne is within walking distance of the fine-dining establishments of Spring Street, Collins Street and Flinders Lane.

Each apartment combines the convenience of home with the luxuries of a hotel, offering fully equipped kitchenettes, large living spaces and striking views over the city’s skyline. Work up a sweat in the extensive gym before taking to the streets to explore everything Melbourne has to offer. Return to relax in the indoor pool or sauna, or soak up the sun’s rays on the deck, before returning to the city once more to sample its outstanding dining scene.

title: Luxe Top-Rated Melbourne Boutique Break in the Heart of Little Italy
description:
Hit the trifecta of iconic Melbourne experiences with a stay at Zagame’s House, an ultra-chic, super-boutique hotel in the heart of Little Italy. Sitting proudly on Lygon Street, this design-led den deals out coffee, wine and graffiti in spades, celebrating the best of the city within its art-decked halls. Surrounded by the cafés, restaurants and bars that put Melbourne’s name on the gourmet map, and just a short walk to the CBD, it’s perfectly positioned for days and nights of exploring, eating and entertaining.

High-tech rooms and suites are plumped with everything you need for a city escape, with MUK hairdryers and straighteners, a sensor-laden minibar, cocktail kit and, if needed, treats for your canine companion (dogs permitted with prior approval). Start the morning at streetside 1851 Coffee + Kitchen - perch on a stool overlooking Lygon Street as you try Melbourne's unique 'magic' coffee and devour a bowl of breakfast ramen before taking to the streets. A luxe 24-hour gym means you can fit in a workout whenever, but after pounding the pavement, a glass of wine and tapas at Lord Lygon Wine Shop might be the recovery you need.

title: Melbourne Riverside Five-Star Apartment-Style Stay with Mineral Pool & Onsite Restaurant
description:
Perfectly positioned in the lively Southbank precinct, Quay West Suites Melbourne is a sophisticated 5-star hotel, ideal for overnight and long-term stays alike. Indulge with a cocktail on the alfresco terrace of the Jarrah Bar or tuck into a tasty treat as you admire the stunning CBD skyline. Then, take some time to relax with a dip in the moody magnesium mineral pool or sweat it out in the steam room and onsite fitness centre.

Quay West Suites Melbourne is your gateway to a luxurious Melbourne lifestyle sitting upon the banks of the Yarra River. Find yourself on the doorstep of trendy shops, restaurants, and bars of the scenic promenade and only a short stroll away from the city’s iconic attractions - the National Gallery of Victoria, Federation Square, Rod Laver Arena and MCG.

title: Self-Contained Central Melbourne Escape with Spectacular City Views
description: Feel like a true urbanite with a stay at the city-central Oaks Melbourne on Lonsdale Suites, located in the heart of Melbourne's vibrant theatre district. This stylish retreat offers a gateway to the city's most iconic attractions, from the bustling Queen Victoria Market to the inspiring National Gallery of Victoria. Savour the culinary delights of Chinatown, just a stone's throw away, or indulge in retail therapy at Bourke Street Mall. Return to your suite to unwind and soak in panoramic city views.

title: Award-Winning Melbourne Radisson Stay Overlooking Flagstaff Gardens
description:
If you’re looking for a sophisticated city stay in the heart of Melbourne, the award-winning Radisson on Flagstaff Gardens Melbourne is the answer. Located on the doorstep of the city's oldest market, the iconic Queen Victoria Market, and immediately opposite the leafy Flagstaff Gardens, this sleek hotel sits in the Free Tram Zone, within walking distance of Flagstaff station. Consistently ranked a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice hotel winner, the hotel offers world-renowned Radisson service and allows you to discover Melbourne’s world-class shopping, coffee and gastronomy with ease.

Facilities include onsite restaurant and bar HQ’s on William, offering expertly prepared dishes from a seasonally rotating menu. Unwind with breathtaking views of the Melbourne skyline at the rooftop fitness centre, or ask the friendly 24-hour concierge for insider tips to help you make the most of your Melbourne experience.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights):**

- Your package includes a **complimentary room upgrade**
- Relax right up until the last moment thanks to guaranteed **1pm late checkout**
- **One child (10 and under) stays free** in existing bedding (accommodation only)

**Deluxe Upgrade**: Upgrade and stay in a Deluxe Park View Room, a refurbished room on the upper floors with stunning views of Flagstaff Gardens.

title: Melbourne Contemporary Box Hill Suites with Rooftop Infinity Pool
description: Enjoy an urban escape in the up-and-coming suburb of Box Hill at Avani Melbourne Box Hill Residences. You'll be within easy walking distance to Box Hill Central shopping and dining precinct, but should you fancy going further afield, Mount Dandenong and local wineries are less than an hour's drive. Perfectly tailored for the modern traveller, these spacious and stylish suites, alongside an expansive rooftop complete with heated infinity pool and spa, ensure a relaxing stay.
offer_address: 12-14 Nelson Road, Box Hill VIC 3128, Australia

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Melbourne Little Collins
title: Vibrant Sky-High Stay in Iconic Melbourne Laneway
description: Melbourne’s best-kept secrets are tucked away in its art-spritzed laneways - be a part of the story at Holiday Inn Express Melbourne Little Collins, an IHG hotel. Unmissable destinations are at every turn with the MCG, National Gallery of Victoria, and SEALIFE Melbourne just a quick tram ride away. Feel like a true urbanite and skip across to the Paris end of Little Collins for some designer retail therapy, or disappear into a hole-in-the-wall cafe for a delightfully Melbourne brew.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Melbourne Little Collins, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 589-599 Little Collins Street, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia

title: Self-Contained Melbourne Apartments with Private Balconies & City Views
description: Be in the heart of the action at Oaks Melbourne Southbank Suites. This chic retreat is a stone's throw from the Yarra River, the National Gallery of Victoria and the Crown Casino, making it the perfect base for your city exploration. Indulge in Melbourne's renowned food scene with a plethora of award-winning restaurants and trendy cafes nearby. After a day of city adventures, you'll find everything you need in your self-contained apartment, complemented by stunning city views from your private balcony.

title: Trendy Central Melbourne Escape with Indoor Heated Pool, Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description:
Experience the vibrancy of Melbourne from the comfort of this perfectly positioned hotel in the heart of the city's bustling theatre district and Chinatown. This stylish hotel offers easy access to the city's renowned laneways, filled with street art, cosy cafes and trendy boutiques.

Savour contemporary Australian cuisine at the onsite Home Kitchen & Bar, enjoy a leisurely swim in the heated indoor pool or unwind in the bubbling spa under a stunning glass ceiling. With the iconic Queen Victoria Market and the National Gallery of Victoria within easy reach, this hotel is the perfect base for your Melbourne adventure.

title: Melbourne Southbank Apartment Break with Indoor Pool
description: Find yourself in the heart of the city buzz with a stay at Adina Apartments Hotel Melbourne Southbank. There's no better location - Southbank’s dazzling collection of high-end restaurants and bars are an easy walk, and you’re never too far from Melbourne's signature perfectly-brewed coffee. The National Gallery of Victoria and the Arts Centre Melbourne are a stone’s throw away, and when you need a moment to recharge, simply return to the hotel and dive into the indoor heated pool.

title: Mövenpick City Break in the Heart of Melbourne with Outdoor Heated Pool
description:
Discover the soul of the Swiss Alps in the tram-filled heart of Australia’s cultural capital with a chic Melbourne stay. Perfectly positioned an easy stroll away from Marvel Stadium, Southern Cross Station and the Airport SkyBus Terminal - there’s no better base to discover Melbourne’s sweet spots.

After days spent seeking the city’s perfect lattes and laneways, return to moments spent by the hotel’s spectacular outdoor heated pool, savour Mövenpick’s iconic Chocolate Hour or admire the hotel’s striking collection of local photography.

title: New Melbourne Hotel in the Heart of Docklands with Rooftop Pool
description: Take in Melbourne's vibrant energy with an elegant waterfront escape in the city's bustling Docklands district. This newly acquired modern hotel is ideally positioned within the city's shopping, dining and entertainment hub on the banks of the Yarra River. When you're not exploring the area, savour farm-to-table cuisine at Storehouse Docklands, or lounge by the hotel's rooftop pool overlooking the city.

title: Contemporary Melbourne Docklands Escape with Rooftop Pool
description:
Take in Melbourne's vibrant energy with a stylish Peppers escape in the heart of the Docklands entertainment and shopping precinct. With Marvel Stadium on your doorstep and The District Docklands a short walk away, this urban sanctuary invites you to spend your days exploring the city streets, shimmering harbourfront or sampling Melbourne's renowned cuisine.

In between exploring Australia's culture capital and its surrounds, indulge in a blend of signature Peppers luxury, upscale sophistication and inner-city living. Enjoy a delicious meal at Momami Restaurant and Bar, or swim a few laps in the heated pool.
offer_address: 679 La Trobe Street, Docklands, Victoria 3008, Australia

vendor_name: The Como Melbourne MGallery by Sofitel
title: Iconic Melbourne South Yarra Luxury on Chapel Street with Heated Rooftop Pool
description:
Situated in the stylish and upscale suburb of South Yarra, The Como Melbourne is an iconic, contemporary five-star hotel and celebrity favourite. Start your day with a dip in the temperature-controlled glistening rooftop pool and savour breakfast at the onsite Brasserie restaurant, before heading out to explore Chapel Street's trendy boutiques.

Gourmands can enjoy the Prahran Market for artisanal goods, renowned eateries for fine dining and eclectic bars for a nightcap - all at The Como Melbourne's doorstep. The CBD's vibrant arts and sporting scene is just a short train ride away.
offer_address: 630 Chapel St, South Yarra, Victoria 3141, Australia

title: Melbourne Experiential Boutique Suite Stay in Former Prison with Unique Wine Bar, Hatted Restaurant & Underground Pool
description: The ultra-luxurious finds an unlikely home at The Interlude, an experiential stay set in a former prison in Melbourne's creative north. Jaw-dropping art, unique experiences and gastronomic delights throw the needle forward for the standard of the city's heritage-rich stays. An intimate collection of just 19 suites, located less than 10km from the CBD, the property features a hatted restaurant focused on the region’s finest produce, led by the former Head Chef of Cumulus Inc. You'll also find what is perhaps the city's most unique wine bar: a detail-oriented venue serving over 500 varieties, located within converted bluestone cells - one of which was Ned Kelly's own. Below floor level lives a spectacular candlelit pool, available for private therapeutic bathing and poolside drinks. For almost 200 years, this was a place people dreamed of escaping. Now, it’s a place you’ll never want to leave.

vendor_name: Hotel Chadstone Melbourne MGallery by Sofitel
title: Five-Star Melbourne Glamour Above Chadstone Shopping Centre with Day Spa
description:
Setting a new benchmark in luxury, this designer retreat promises to deliver you into glamour with a stay in Australia's Fashion Capital. Inspired by the creative journey of fashion, Hotel Chadstone Melbourne - MGallery Collection offers a voyage of seamless discoveries, exceptional service and stunning views of the Melbourne skyline, Port Phillip Bay and the Dandenong Ranges.

Invigorate your mind and body at the multi-purpose fitness centre or the indoor curved rooftop pool. Indulge in soothing treatments at Holism Retreat Melbourne Day Spa and savour culinary delights at Pastore restaurant, before sipping cool cocktails at Altus Rooftop & Bar.
offer_address: 1341 Dandenong Road, Chadstone, Melbourne, Victoria, 3148, Australia

vendor_name: The Savoy Hotel on Little Collins Melbourne

description: Find out why Melbourne is heralded as one of the world's most livable cities with a heritage stay at The Savoy Hotel on Little Collins - a timeless gem located on one of the city's most iconic streets. Inside, you will find a grand yet welcoming lobby, a cocktail bar and lounge on the ground floor, plus the serene V Hotel Spa and gym to cater to all of your wellness needs. Stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2022 award, this quintessentially Melbourne retreat makes for the perfect hideaway as you soak up the vibrant city streets of Victoria's capital.
location_description: The Savoy Hotel on Little Collins

description: Stay in the beating heart of Melbourne’s Flinders Lane, savouring the variety of foodie flavours wafting down the renowned street, shopping the quirky boutiques, and immersing yourself in the creative flare with a stay at Hotel Indigo Melbourne on Flinders, an IHG Hotel. Modern sophistication awaits with rooms overlooking the city streets, and the elegant Beso Bar & Restaurant serving a flavoursome buffet breakfast, before transforming into a Spanish-inspired tapas, wine and cocktail bar.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Melbourne on Flinders, an IHG Hotel

title: Central Vibe Melbourne Riverside Escape with Heated Indoor Pool
description: Absorb the urban essence of cosmopolitan Melbourne - Australia's bustling cultural capital - with a stylish stay at Vibe Hotel Melbourne in the heart of the CBD. Rising from its heritage base and boasting a prime position on the corner of Queen Street and Flinders Street, this urban retreat is at the epicentre of all things Melbourne, from world-class galleries to rooftop bars, upscale boutiques and major sporting venues. The hotel has a luxurious heated indoor swimming pool, fitness centre and sleek eatery-hangout St Marks Road Co., while each contemporary room features floor-to-ceiling windows framing stunning cityscapes. Within a 15-minute stroll, you will be sipping drinks on Southbank, checking out the fascinating Immigration Museum, dining at the renowned Chin Chin or grabbing pastries and coffee at Lune Croissanterie.

title: Adelphi Hotel LPC
