title: Novotel Escape in the Heart of Melbourne’s Fashion District with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description: Between the prestigious thoroughfare of Bourke Street Mall and Collins Street’s sophisticated retail precinct, the well-appointed Novotel Melbourne on Collins offers the perfect place to discover the city's iconic laneways and lattes. Located directly above the upscale boutiques of St Collins Lane, you'll be perfectly placed for a romantic escape or a decadent staycation. Refuel at the Lane Restaurant before exploring Melbourne's many hidden gems.

title: Elegant Melbourne Airport Hotel with Three Dining Venues, Spa & Pool
description:
Perfectly positioned for a smooth layover, this hotel is just a stone's throw from Melbourne Airport and a short drive from the vibrant city centre. Savour contemporary Australian cuisine at the stylish Amber State Taphouse and Kitchen, tuck into Italian cuisine at Boccata Restaurant or sample famous Melbourne coffee at Small Holdings cafe.

Keep active in the well-equipped fitness centre, swim laps of the pool or explore the nearby attractions, including the historic Queen Victoria Market and the lush Royal Botanic Gardens.
offer_address: 1 Grants Road, Melbourne Airport, Tullamarine, Melbourne 3045, Victoria, Australia

title: Heritage Escape in the Heart of Melbourne with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description: Follow in the footsteps of international celebrities and dignitaries with a stay at Rendezvous Hotel Melbourne, a heritage-listed property renowned for its original Victorian décor and yesteryear charm. Delight in a bustling hotel restaurant and bar, where you can dine on mouthwatering dishes or indulge in a high tea from Thursday to Sunday (additional charges apply). Sitting on Flinders Street in Melbourne’s CBD, this grand hotel couldn’t be closer to the action - just across the road from Flinders Street Railway Station and surrounded by some of the city’s best-known bars and restaurants.

title: Retro-Cool Melbourne Designer Ovolo Escape with Speakeasy Bar
description: Embrace the extraordinary with an escape to Ovolo South Yarra, where raw rockstar energy meets designer sophistication in the beating heart of cosmopolitan Melbourne. Located near the corner of Toorak Road and Chapel Street, this super-cool, inner-city retreat has it all - tuck into delicious vegan and vegetarian fare at Lona Misa, sate your thirst at hidden speakeasy Backroom or step out of the hotels doors and find yourself among the city's dazzling spread of bars, restaurants and clubs.
offer_address: 234 Toorak Road, South Yarra, Victoria 3141, Australia

title: Sophisticated Sky-High Melbourne Apartment-Style Escape with Onsite Restaurant
description:
Experience a world of cosmopolitan charm and luxury in the heart of Melbourne's vibrant CBD. Oakwood Premier Melbourne is a stone's throw from the city's premier shopping district, home to high-end fashion boutiques and the historic Queen Victoria Market.

Indulge in the city's thriving food scene with a visit to Hardware Lane, renowned for its al fresco dining and live jazz music. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's sky-high pool for a refreshing dip or enjoy a leisurely stroll along the nearby Yarra River.

title: Boutique Melbourne Laneway Luxury with Rooftop Swimming Pool
description: Towering 29 stories above the bustling heart of Flinders Lane is Quincy Melbourne, a luxuriously fun abode that brings the zing of Southeast Asia to Melbourne. Excellent facilities include an onsite cafe, SingSong, Salted Egg - the hotel's exceptional signature restaurant - and a rooftop pool, where you can kick back while taking in views across Melbourne's skyline.

title: Modern Melbourne Escape within Melton Entertainment Park with Onsite Sports Bar
description:
There are stays that just seem to tick all the boxes, and this modern escape on Melbourne's outskirts does just that. Try an Old Fashioned at the onsite Scotch Notch Cafe, savour generous Australian grill pub meals at thriving Popular Alm Bistro or wine and dine in at the Gammalite Sports Bar.

Hop from one entertaining watering hole to another in slow succession (each is to be thoroughly enjoyed) and barely spare what lies beyond the Melton Entertainment Park's racing tracks a thought. Though, if you're tempted, the Woodgrove Shopping Centre is nearby and Melbourne's CBD is a 40-minute drive.

title: Melbourne Pullman Luxury in the Heart of Albert Park with Indoor Pool & Lakeview Restaurant
description:
If you’re looking for a five-star yet tranquil Melbourne city stay, look no further than this modern sanctuary. Perfectly poised on the famed Albert Park Lake, and within walking distance of picturesque Fawkner Park, this stylish hotel sits moments from the buzz of the CBD, St Kilda's iconic beaches and the bars and boutiques of South Yarra’s eclectic Chapel Street.

Part of the acclaimed Pullman Hotels and Resorts brand, Pullman Melbourne Albert Park offers guests a first-class experience through its state-of-the-art amenities and outstanding service. Treat yourself to a global dining affair at Windows Restaurant or opt for something more relaxed with a drink at Mortimer's.
offer_address: 65 Queens Road, Albert Park, Melbourne, Victoria 3004, Australia

title: Melbourne CBD Escape with Wellness Centre, Indoor Pool & Onsite Bar
description:
Experience one of Melbourne's most sought-after addresses at this upscale hotel on Little Lonsdale Street. Take advantage of its enviable location, just a tram ride away from the world-famous dining of Flinders Lane, bustling al fresco eateries of Hardware Lane, vibrant salesmanship of the Queen Victoria Market and the retail mecca of Bourke Street Mall.

After a day spent exploring the city, relax with an evening drink at the hotel’s opulent Jin Bar, named after the Mandarin word for gold. When total relaxation is in order, ascend to the hotel’s dedicated wellness spaces including an indoor heated pool, jacuzzi, sauna and steam room.
offer_address: 615 Little Lonsdale Street, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia

title: Contemporary Melbourne Retreat Overlooking Albert Park with Indoor Pool & Sauna
description:
Explore Australia's cultural capital from this tranquil haven, overlooking the picturesque Albert Park Lake and F1 Australian Grand Prix track. Enjoy the best of both worlds from your serene spot, with a base that allows for easy access to the city while providing an nightly escape where you can truly unwind. 

Whether you plan relax in cocoon comfortable bedding or energise your day at the fully-equipped fitness centre, every detail at Mercure Melbourne Albert Park crafted to enhance your stay. Wander towards the high streets of Prahran and Windsor to discover curated cafes and buzzy restaurants, or hop on a short tram to either the city or St Kilda to see, hear or do something new.

title: Stylish Novotel Melbourne Escape near South Wharf DFO & Convention Centre with Onsite Restaurants
description:
With the serene Yarra River on one side and South Wharf's iconic DFO and Melbourne Convention Centre on the other, Novotel Melbourne South Wharf promises a location like no other. Immerse yourself in the colourful canvas of Southbank from this sophisticated hotel which puts premium shopping on your doorstep, with Melbourne's famed outlets, boutiques and malls just metres away.

Enjoy access to exceptional facilities including a contemporary lounge and spacious light-filled rooms with views across Port Philip Bay or the captivating city skyline. Round out your days at Mr Carpano Dining + Bar or Allora cafe for a well-deserved drink or delicious bite to eat.
offer_address: 7 Convention Centre Place, South Wharf, Victoria 3006, Australia

title: Top-Rated Ovolo Laneways Melbourne Escape
description: Immerse yourself in Melbourne’s creative culture during an escape at the top-rated Ovolo Laneways - a designer wonderland inspired by the hidden laneways and street art of the CBD's iconic canvas. Nestled amid popular brunch spots, stylish bars, live music venues, theatres and fashionable boutiques, this eclectic hotel puts you within walking distance of the area’s hottest spots. Even attractions outside the city centre are easy to reach, with easy access to Melbourne's extensive network of trams and trains.
offer_address: 19 Little Bourke Street, Melbourne 3000, Victoria, Australia

title: Melbourne Art Series Retreat Near Chapel Street & Prahran Market
description:
Experience the vibrant energy of Melbourne's art scene with a stylish stay at this aesthetic retreat, perfectly positioned in trendy Prahran - the city's fashion and foodie hub. Each suite and penthouse in this designer hotel is inspired by the work of renowned Australian artist Adam Cullen, creating a unique blend of luxury and creativity.

Just a short stroll away, you'll find the famous Prahran Market, Melbourne's oldest continuously running food market, and the lush greenery of the Royal Botanic Gardens. Back at your art-filled hotel, tuck into a feast at the onsite Gold restaurant, keep up your routine at the fitness centre or retreat to your elegant suite featuring dreamy bedding and a kitchenette.
offer_address: 164 Commercial Rd, Prahran, Melbourne, Victoria, 3181, Australia

title: Melbourne Modern Apartment Stay near Queen Victoria Market
description: Discover Melbourne's famous Queen Victoria Market with a stay at the modern apartment-style Veriu Queen Victoria Market. In between exploring Australia's cultural capital and its surrounds, enjoy a grab-and-go snack at the Pantry, rejuvenate your body and mind at the fitness centre or cool off with a dip in the shimmering pool. Make the Lobby Bar your first stop before a night out on the town, or retreat to your tranquil apartment-style suite to relax after your urban explorations.

title: Five-Star Langham Melbourne Luxury on the Banks of the Yarra River
description: Experience the epitome of Melbourne sophistication with a stay at The Langham, Melbourne, a five-star retreat on the banks of the iconic Yarra River. This luxurious hotel is just a stone's throw from the city's vibrant Southbank precinct, home to world-class dining, upscale boutiques and the renowned National Gallery of Victoria. Indulge at the hotel's exquisite Chuan Spa, savour innovative cuisine at Melba Restaurant or simply unwind in your elegantly appointed room.
offer_address: 1 Southgate Avenue, Southbank, Melbourne, Victoria 3006, Australia

title: Melbourne Laneway Luxury with Rooftop Swimming Pool
description: Stay in the beating urban heart of Melbourne's buzzing CBD at voco Melbourne Central, an IHG Hotel, a stylish and ultra-modern hideaway. Between explorations, recharge your batteries with a dip in the rooftop swimming pool, sip a sophisticated cocktail while admiring the glittering cityscape from a great height, or feast on a succulent steak at Blacksmith Bar & Grill. When you're ready to venture beyond your hotel, Queen Victoria Market and Chinatown are just a nine-minute stroll away.
location_description: voco Melbourne Central, an IHG hotel

title: Melbourne CBD Stylish Self-Contained Studio Escape
description: Oaks Melbourne on William Suites boasts a range of fully-furnished studios and apartments with a prime location in the CBD: brushing shoulders with Flagstaff Station and Flagstaff Gardens. Grab a morning cup of coffee at the hotel’s onsite café before exploring the iconic Queen Victoria Market just a five-minute walk away. Explore the intricacies of the historic State Library Victoria before indulging in a dose of retail therapy at the nearby Melbourne Central and Emporium Melbourne shopping centres. You’ll be spoilt for choice for shopping opportunities, entertainment venues or world-class dining options staying at these sophisticated studios and apartments, each offering handy kitchen facilities so you dine in or out as you please.

vendor_name: Adina Apartment Hotel Melbourne on Flinders
title: Melbourne CBD Apartment Stay near Federation Square
description: Stay in the beating heart of Melbourne CBD at Adina Apartment Hotel Melbourne on Flinders, located just a hop, skip and jump from Federation Square and Flinders Street train station. The crowning glory of this property is its incredible location. The vibrant bustle of the CBD is right on your doorstep: an abundance of cocktail bars, restaurants, and cafés are all just a short walk away. When you're not sampling the world-class food and culture of the city, the studios and apartments offer a tranquil haven away from the buzz of the city, complete with full kitchens and laundry facilities.
location_description: Adina Apartment Hotel Melbourne on Flinders

title: Elegant Melbourne CBD Opulence with Two Restaurants & Sophisticated Cocktail Bar
description:
In the heart of Melbourne’s buzzing CBD, enjoy a luxury boutique stay at this bold designer retreat, where bohemian charm meets urban sophistication. Set amid the iconic East End Theatre District, you're perfectly placed to explore the city's cultural pulse. Historic laneways and fashion-forward boutiques are all at your doorstep.

Begin your day with skyline views and Mediterranean-inspired bites at the rooftop restaurant, Mid Air, while coastal Spanish flavours beckon from Marmelo. After exploring the city’s vibrant arts, culture and dining scene, return to your hotel's eclectic cocktail bar and late-night supper club, Mr Mills, for some well-crafted drinks and top-class DJ sets.

title: Novotel Escape in the Heart of Melbourne with Panoramic City Views
description:
Cobblestone laneways, hidden coffee shops and some of Australia’s finest dining: this stylish high-rise hotel is the perfect introduction to Melbourne’s extraordinary spirit, with Hardware Lane just metres away and vibrant Bourke Street within easy reach.

Part of the esteemed Novotel brand, the hotel offers supreme comfort and elegant, minimalist design. After exploring Melbourne's top attractions, return to exceptional facilities, including a fully equipped fitness centre, impressive event spaces and contemporary Italian cuisine at the onsite Pretty Boy Bar & Restaurant.

title: Leafy Melbourne City Stay Near Fitzroy Gardens with Fine-Dining Restaurant
description:
Escape to a world of lattes, laneways and leafy gardens with a stay at this hotel perfectly positioned between the historic Fitzroy Gardens, MCG and Rod Laver Arena. Following a stunning multi-million-dollar renovation, the luxe rooms and suites feature window chaise lounges accentuating showstopping skyline views.

Savour every bite at The Cliveden Bar & Dining, an upscale eatery celebrating Victorian produce, native Australian ingredients and European flair, and explore the city’s many mysteries, marvels and macchiatos, just a stone’s throw from countless world-class restaurants, rooftop bars and electrifying nightlife.

title: Grand Opening: Inner City Melbourne Escape with Heated Indoor Pool
description: Treat yourself to a lavish inner-city escape in the heart of Victoria's cultural capital with Dorsett Melbourne, a thriving and modern retreat that only threw open its doors in early 2023. Take the day to stroll through THE LUME Melbourne and eat your way along the banks of the Yarra River, where fine dining meets modern trends, before treating yourself to a moment in the hotel’s wellness space, where you will find a perfectly heated indoor pool, steam room and sauna. When the time comes to rehydrate, do it in style at Jin Bar or Port Bistro.
offer_address: 615 Little Lonsdale Street, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia

title: Contemporary Melbourne Airport Escape with Complimentary Terminal Shuttle
description: Step off the plane and straight into the contemporary Holiday Inn Melbourne Airport, an IHG Hotel, which offers guests the ideal combination of convenience, comfort and class. When you return from your adventures, stretch your legs at the seek fitness centre, refuel at Vargas Restaurant or get ready for your onward journey.

title: Modern Melbourne Escape in Fitzroy with Fine Dining Restaurant & Rooftop Bar

Set in the heart of Melbourne's most eclectic neighbourhood, experience a boutique stay at Fitzroy's trendiest luxury hotel just steps from stylish cafes, hidden galleries and vintage stores. Settle in for a delightful Thai-inspired meal at BANG - a delectable dining destination with a seasonally driven menu and a focus on the vibrant street food experience.

Ascend to the top floor to toast to your stay at the rooftop terrace bar - offering panoramic views of the city skyline and only accessible to guests of the hotel. When it's time to explore, Melbourne's inner north's shopping and dining hubs are walkable, while the city centre boasting Flinder's Street Dining, the theatre district and the National Gallery of Victoria is a short tram ride away.

title: Contemporary Melbourne CBD Apartments near MCG & Bourke Street Mall
description:
Step into the vibrant heart of Melbourne's bustling CBD with a stay at these contemporary and stylish apartments, set in the legal precinct of Little Bourke Street. With self-contained studios and apartments, all with top-notch amenities, you'll have everything you need for a stress-free urban adventure. Take advantage of the location and explore the vibrant Queen Victoria Market and the stunning Royal Botanic Gardens, or for sporting fans, the Melbourne Cricket Ground and the Etihad Stadium are both a short 10-minute drive away.

When hunger strikes, tuck into comfort food and sip on a refreshing drink at the hotel's ALIBI Urban Gastropub and later, work up a sweat at the fully equipped gym. For a spot of retail therapy, don't forget to visit the nearby Bourke Street Mall and splurge away.
offer_address: 471 Little Bourke Street, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia

title: Platinum Penthouse: Modern South Melbourne Escape with Skyline Views for up to Eight Guests
description: Elevate your Melbourne adventures with the epitome of self-contained luxury at the Platinum Penthouse, a home-away-from-home, moments from Southbank and the CBD. Located between Clarendon Street and Kings Way, this stunning penthouse offers breathtaking city views, a fully equipped gourmet kitchen, and open-plan living areas with impressive floor-to-ceiling windows. Venture out to explore Melbourne's arts scene, world-class dining and high-end shopping precincts.

title: Newly Refurbished Melbourne CBD Stay with Rooftop Pool, Bar & Restaurant
description:
Unlock the beauty of the city with a relaxing stay at the recently transformed Rydges Melbourne. Emerging from the CBD’s concrete jungle in the heart of Melbourne’s theatre district, this sparkling space boasts uber-modern facilities, impeccable service and access to the city’s most famous tourist and local spots.

Admire the city’s shimmering skyline with a curated cocktail in hand or from the comfort of the open-air rooftop pool. When you’re not eating dumplings in Chinatown or catching an AFL match at the MCG, treat yourself to a delicious meal in-house at the newly refurbished signature restaurant.

title: Five-Star QT Melbourne Escape in the Heart of the CBD
description: One mention of the five-star QT Melbourne evokes world-class hospitality, eclectic décor, and the famous rooftop bar with an unparalleled view, all in the heart of the bustling CBD. Soak in industrial chic in this luxurious hotel, before venturing out to explore historic laneways and vibrant Chinatown. Iconic Melbourne destinations are on your doorstep, along with an array of world-class restaurants and lively bars. If you’re not sure where to go, opulent French-inspired dining is on offer at onsite Pascale Bar & Grill, handcrafted cocktails await at Bar 133 and hidden Hot Sauce Laneway ups the cool factor.

title: Melbourne Art Deco Beachside Escape
description:
Experience Melbourne’s vibrant beachside neighbourhood, St Kilda, from the iconic Prince Hotel. Occupying a large and beautifully maintained Art Deco building right on Acland Street, The Prince Hotel takes you to the heart of this bayside suburb, minutes from the shores of St Kilda Beach and a short stroll from the restaurants, pubs and bars that dot the esplanade.

An icon of St Kilda, the hotel is home to a plethora of dining venues and a rooftop beer garden, where you can admire spectacular sunsets over Port Phillip Bay. With the history of St Kilda steeped throughout, indulge in a world of minimalist luxury, modern design, custom furniture and unique sculptures crafted by local artists.
offer_address: 2 Acland Street, St Kilda, Victoria 3182, Australia

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Melbourne, an IHG Hotel
title: Central Melbourne Yarra River Escape with Rooftop Swimming Pool
description: Stay in Melbourne's CBD on the banks of the Yarra River at the Crowne Plaza Melbourne, an IHG Hotel serving up unmatched panoramas across the river and cityscape. Melbourne is a foodies' haven, and the hotel's three onsite restaurants are guaranteed to satisfy your cravings: start or finish the day at Yugo for buffet breakfasts or an exceptional dinner experience, sip a renowned Melbourne coffee at Pow Wow and order your favourite cocktail at Dive Bar. When you're ready to explore, you'll find yourself within easy reach of fashionable South Yarra and suave Southbank, and with the temptations of the South Wharf shopping outlet on your doorstep. Between adventures, enjoy leisure time at the brand-new fitness centre or at the rooftop swimming pool.

title: Boutique South Yarra Art Series Retreat with Glass-Bottom Pool, Dive Bar & Restaurant
description:
Delve into Melbourne's eclectic art scene with a stylish stay at this aesthetic retreat, perfectly positioned on Chapel Street, the city's fashion and foodie hub. Each suite or penthouse in this boutique hotel is adorned with the lyrical artwork of renowned Australian artist John Olsen, lending it a characteristic aura.

You can take a stroll along the Yarra River or venture a little further to explore Melbourne's sports and entertainment hubs. Back at your art-filled hotel, go for a swim in the glass-bottomed pool overlooking Chapel Street, indulge in a paddock-to-plate dining experience at Spoonbill Restaurant and sip on refreshing drinks at the high-end dive bar, Two Wrongs, after a long day of urban adventures.
offer_address: 637/641 Chapel St, South Yarra, Victoria, 3141, Australia

title: Ultra-Cool Central Melbourne Apartment Escape
description: Immerse yourself in Melbourne’s vibrant culture with a stay at Scape Living at Franklin, a unique city break located amid hidden laneways and street art. This contemporary escape is on Melbourne CBD's doorstep, with popular brunch spots, stylish bars, live music venues, theatres and fashionable boutiques all within reach. Within the eclectic hotel itself, you can gaze over the skyline from the residents-only lounge, shake off a long day at the gym or do your best work in the Collab Lounge.

title: Melbourne Heritage Escape Located in Former Her Majesty's Prison Pentridge
description: Set within the blue stone walls of the former Her Majesty's Prison Pentridge, Adina Apartment Hotel Penridge is rife with history, heritage and undeniable style. This historic site boasts modern facilities including a restaurant and bar (opening in May 2023), while the hotel's façade still reflects the grandeur of its former life. Located just eight kilometres from Melbourne CBD, the city's eclectic mix of restaurants, bars, galleries and attractions are all a short drive away.

title: Melbourne Peppers Apartments in the Heart of Southbank with Wine Bar & Rooftop Heated Pool
description:
Experience the essence of Melbourne at this inner-city haven, where lattes, laneways and the city's signature trams set the scene. More than just a hotel, this inner-city abode is the perfect base to explore romantic rooftop bars, art-splashed laneways and upscale boutiques.

Return to light-filled, self-contained apartments - each featuring fully equipped kitchens, spacious living areas, laundries and spectacular views - and sample Victorian-focused wines, hand-selected by world-renowned sommeliers, at Edwin Wine Bar and Cellar before plunging into the glittering rooftop heated pool.

title: Top-Rated QT Melbourne Luxury in the Heart of the City with Daily Breakfast
description:
Immerse yourself in a quintessential city experience with a stay at the ultra-stylish QT Melbourne. Located in a converted cinema complex, the hotel draws on the street art and industrial architecture of the city’s laneways to offer unique design paired with all the luxuries you would expect from the renowned QT brand. With a range of boutique dining options, including two stunning rooftop bars and the exceptional Pascale Bar and Grill, it's no surprise that the hotel has collected a slew of awards from the likes of Gourmet Traveller and The Age Good Food Guide.

Perfectly positioned between the high-end boutiques of the ‘Paris end’ of Collins Street and bustling Chinatown, QT Melbourne provides easy access to the best of the city, with a plethora of fine dining restaurants, hidden bars, theatres, museums and galleries, sporting venues, lush parks and gardens within strolling distance.

title: Melbourne Stylish Oaks Apartment Escape near Marvel Stadium
description: Fans of Melbourne's nightlife and passionate sports culture will delight in a stay at Oaks Melbourne on Market Hotel, located mere moments from Marvel Stadium and the sports precinct of Melbourne. Whether you want to catch a local AFL game, cricket match or live music performance, a stay here is perfectly positioned, with the CBD's best restaurants and bars in the immediate vicinity. The hotel's convenient facilities are dedicated to its guests' comfort, including the delicious Oak & Vine restaurant, an indoor swimming pool, steamy sauna and well-equipped fitness centre.

title: Melbourne Sky-High Self-Contained Suite Escape in the Heart of the CBD
description: Embrace the beauty and charm of Melbourne with an ultra-modern suite escape at the sky-high AVANI Melbourne Central Residences. Perfectly located in the heart of the CBD, this stylish hotel brings the best of Melbourne to your feet. Discover the city by day, and retreat to a stylish suite - each with convenient kitchen facilities - perched high above the city lights at night. Offering beautifully furnished suites and luxe facilities including an onsite gym, an indoor pool and an outdoor spa bath, this cutting-edge hotel has everything you need for a luxe city escape.

title: Melbourne Heritage Glamour with Rooftop Swimming Pool & Jacuzzi
description: Stay in heritage luxury at InterContinental Melbourne The Rialto, an IHG Hotel, located inside the Rialto precinct where the 1890s neo-Gothic façade, glass-topped atrium and ornate windows will transport you to the refined elegance of yesteryear Melbourne. Discover a charming escape with state-of-the-art facilities: swim in the enclosed rooftop pool, enjoy a soak and steam in the rooftop jacuzzi and sauna, or dine at the two onsite restaurants, Ronnie's and the Alluvial Restaurant & Bluestone Bar.
location_description: InterContinental Melbourne The Rialto, an IHG Hotel

title: Panoramic Sky View Penthouse: Sky-High South Melbourne Retreat for up to Six Guests
description: For urban luxury at its finest, enjoy a stylish stay at the Panoramic Sky View Penthouse in the heart of South Melbourne, walking distance from Clarendon Street and the South Melbourne Market. This sanctuary boasts a private terrace with panoramic city views, a state-of-the-art kitchen and a spacious master suite. Explore South Melbourne's dining scene, or jump on a tram to take in Melbourne's vibrant arts district, teeming with contemporary galleries and theatres.

title: Five-Star Park Hyatt Melbourne Glamour with Sweeping City Views
description:
Surrounded by century-old elm trees and flanked by Collins Street’s luxury boutiques, heritage architecture and theatre district, the iconic Park Hyatt Melbourne offers a five-star stay worthy of its cosmopolitan city home. An urban retreat overlooking the picturesque Fitzroy Gardens and grandeur of St. Patrick’s Cathedral, Park Hyatt is ready to welcome you to one of the world’s most liveable cities in luxury. Mingle with Melburnians in the know at the award-winning Radii Restaurant & Bar, where an inspired menu is prepared by expert chefs in open kitchens, or indulge your palate at the Tea Lounge, offering exquisite views over the hotel's Trilogy Garden. On the ninth floor, Park Club Health & Day Spa will awe you with its rooftop tennis court, 25m indoor lap pool and award-winning spa, where you can unwind after a day of exploration

One of the most exciting cities in Australia, Melbourne brings art, café culture and gastronomy to life, boasting some of the best restaurants in the world, acclaimed galleries and a lively bar scene. There are many distinct urban pockets just waiting to be explored, from the designer boutiques of the CBD to the stylish bars of South Yarra's Chapel Street and quirky charms of Fitzroy and Brunswick. So put on your walking shoes, hop on a tram and discover the city like a true Melburnian.

title: Stylish Melbourne City Apartment Stay with Rooftop Pool
description: Positioned opposite the city’s beloved Melbourne Central upscale shopping district and surrounded by tramways and cafes, an apartment-style stay at Scape Living at Aurora offers the ultimate city break. When you’re not out and about, descend to the cosy lobby for great coffee and good times or head to the rooftop swimming pool for a sophisticated splash overlooking the heritage campus of the Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology.

title: Boutique Lancemore Melbourne Laneway Luxury near Theatre District
description:
Embrace Melburnian culture with a luxurious laneway stay at the new Lancemore Crossley St. - a cutting-edge, designer retreat located in the city's prestigious Paris end, only moments from Chinatown and the iconic Theatre District. Effortlessly capturing Melbourne's juxtaposing grit and glamour through its stylish design and upscale amenities, Lancemore Crossley St. offers a quintessential experience for those seeking a bucket-list ticking stay in Victoria's vibrant capital. 

Head to the hotel's Manhattan-style Rooftop Terrace for skyline vistas and pre-theatre cocktails, before stepping out onto the surrounding streets to discover hole-in-the-wall cafés, high-end boutiques, and an endless network of top-notch restaurants. From gourmet capital to sporting hub, Lancemore Crossley St. is the perfect launchpad for cashing in on Melbourne's calendar of events, with the MCG, Rod Laver Arena and Her Majesty's Theatre all within easy reach.
offer_address: 51 Little Bourke Street, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia

title: Sophisticated Jazz-Inspired Melbourne Apartment Stay
description:
If you’re looking for a boutique stay that captures the arty, creative spirit of Melbourne, look no further than Avani Melbourne Jazz Corner Residences.

In a prime CBD location overlooking Flagstaff Gardens, Avani Melbourne Jazz Corner Residences offers a collection of stylish self-contained apartments with full hotel service. In Singers Lane behind the hotel, you'll find live jazz club Bird’s Basement - the partner venue of New York’s famous Birdland. Explore the city by day and lose yourself in the sounds of the finest international and local jazz musicians by night.

title: Five-Star Melbourne Riverside Luxury with Unbeatable CBD Location
description: Retreat to a haven of tranquillity boasting panoramic vistas of the Yarra River, Port Phillip Bay, and city skyline at Pan Pacific Melbourne, a stylish oasis adorned in designer artwork. Inside you'll find a 24-hour gym, a contemporary restaurant serving dishes highlighting Australia's fresh local produce, and a dedicated concierge team on hand to help you discover the best of Melbourne. During your stay, discover the city's hidden laneways and rooftop bars from this privileged location.
offer_address: 2 Convention Centre Place, South Wharf, Melbourne 3006, Victoria, Australia

title: Sophisticated Melbourne Escape near Chadstone Shopping Centre & Monash University
description: For a relaxing eastern Melbourne escape, indulge in a stay at PARKROYAL Monash Melbourne, a stone's throw from city highlights such as Chadstone Shopping Centre, Monash University and Sandown Racecourse. Shop until you drop at Melbourne's fashion capital, immerse yourself in the education and research hub at the university or enjoy a race day before returning to the peace and quiet of the stylish hotel. Wind down with a drink and nibbles at the hotel's wine bar - Enoteca Bar & Lounge - or opt for a dip in the outdoor heated swimming pool.

title: Contemporary Mercure Melbourne CBD Escape with Onsite Dining
description:
Tucked between iconic Bourke Street - home to the eponymous mall - and immediately next door to Emporium, Mercure Welcome Melbourne's location on Little Bourke is second to none. Savour a Melbourne-strength coffee at Soul Cafe before a day of exploration, then return to relax in your contemporary room.

Moments from Melbourne's free tram network and Melbourne Central's collection of shops and restaurants, this contemporary hotel boasts easy access to Chinatown, Queen Victoria Market, Degraves Street, Southbank - offering next-level dining along the Yarra River - and local cultural attractions such as the historic Shrine of Remembrance.
offer_address: 265 Little Bourke Street, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia

title: Stylish Stay in the Heart of Melbourne with Onsite Cocktail Bar & Indoor Pool
description:
Stay in the stylish 'Paris End' of one of Melbourne's famous laneways at this CBD escape, placing you within perfect reach of the city's best attractions. Drink and dine at Harry's Restaurant onsite, serving a tantalising menu of contemporary Australian cuisine and cocktails.

Fitness enthusiasts will love the modern onsite gym, while the hotel's heated indoor pool is perfect to soothe sore muscles after a day of urban exploration. Enjoying a prime location on the Parisian-style Little Collins Street, the hotel is the ideal retreat for those looking to discover Melbourne.
offer_address: 111 Little Collins Street, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia

title: Central Melbourne Stay with City's Highest Rooftop Bar
description:
Located just off Little Bourke Street in the city's renowned retail district, this five-star hotel is perfectly placed to explore Melbourne. Access this urban retreat through a hidden laneway and indulge at Eva’s Restaurant & Bar or enjoy cocktails with panoramic skyline views at Blossom Rooftop Bar, Melbourne’s highest rooftop bar.

Explore nearby landmarks like the State Library of Victoria, Federation Square and the National Gallery of Victoria, or venture further to the Dandenong Ranges and the Yarra Valley.
offer_address: 265 Little Bourke Street, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia
